title.text: RFC 2879:  Content Feature Schema for Internet Fax (V2)

contents.text:
Network Working Group                                             G. Klyne
Request for Comments: 2879                            Content Technologies
Obsoletes: 2531                                                L. McIntyre
Category: Standards Track                                Xerox Corporation
                                                               August 2000
Content Feature Schema for Internet Fax (V2)
contents.zh-CHS: Internet传真的内容功能架构（V2）

contents.text: Status of this Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录的状况

contents.text: This document specifies an Internet standards track protocol for the Internet community, and requests discussion and suggestions for improvements. Please refer to the current edition of the "Internet Official Protocol Standards" (STD 1) for the standardization state and status of this protocol. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件规定了互联网社区的互联网标准跟踪协议，并要求进行讨论和提出改进建议。有关本协议的标准化状态和状态，请参考当前版本的“互联网官方协议标准”（STD 1）。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.text: Copyright Notice
contents.zh-CHS: 版权公告

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document defines a content media feature schema for Internet fax.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档定义了Internet传真的内容媒体功能架构。

contents.text: It is a profile of the media feature registration mechanisms [1,2,3] for use in performing capability identification between extended Internet fax systems [5]. It replaces and updates the feature schema defined in RFC 2531.
contents.zh-CHS: 它是媒体功能注册机制[1,2,3]的概要文件，用于在扩展互联网传真系统之间执行功能识别[5]。它替换并更新RFC 2531中定义的特征模式。

contents.text: Table of Contents
contents.zh-CHS: 目录

contents.text: 1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: This document defines a content media feature schema for Internet fax.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档定义了Internet传真的内容媒体功能架构。

contents.text: It is a profile of the media feature registration mechanisms [1,2,3] for use in performing capability identification between extended Internet fax systems [5]. It replaces and updates the feature schema defined in RFC 2531.
contents.zh-CHS: 它是媒体功能注册机制[1,2,3]的概要文件，用于在扩展互联网传真系统之间执行功能识别[5]。它替换并更新RFC 2531中定义的特征模式。

contents.text: The media feature description mechanisms do not describe any specific mechanisms for communicating capability information, but do presume that any such mechanisms will transfer textual values. In conjunction with this feature schema, they specify a textual format to be used for describing Internet Fax capability information.
contents.zh-CHS: 媒体功能描述机制不描述任何用于传递功能信息的特定机制，但假定任何此类机制都将传递文本值。结合此功能模式，它们指定用于描述Internet传真功能信息的文本格式。

contents.text: The range of capabilities that can be indicated are based on those covered by the TIFF file format for Internet fax [7] and Group 3 facsimile [6]. A companion document [4] describes the relationship and mapping between this schema and Group 3 fax capabilities.
contents.zh-CHS: 可以指出的功能范围基于互联网传真[7]和第3组传真[6]的TIFF文件格式所涵盖的功能范围。附带文档[4]描述了此模式与第3组传真功能之间的关系和映射。

contents.text: 1.1 Organization of this document
contents.zh-CHS: 1.1 本文件的组织

contents.text: Section 2 specifies the overall syntax for fax feature descriptions by reference to the media feature registration and syntax documents [1,2].
contents.zh-CHS: 第2节通过参考媒体功能注册和语法文档[1,2]，规定了传真功能描述的总体语法。

contents.text: Section 3 enumerates the feature tags that are to be recognized and processed by extended Internet fax systems, according to their capabilities.
contents.zh-CHS: 第3节列举了扩展Internet传真系统根据其功能识别和处理的功能标签。

contents.text: Appendix A contains additional feature tag registrations for media features that are specific to fax and for which no applicable registration already exists. These are presented in the form prescribed by the media feature registration procedure [1].
contents.zh-CHS: 附录A包含特定于传真且尚未存在适用注册的媒体功能的附加功能标签注册。这些以媒体特征注册程序[1]规定的形式呈现。

contents.text: 1.2 Terminology and document conventions
contents.zh-CHS: 1.2 术语和文件公约

contents.text: The term "extended Internet fax system" is used to describe any software, device or combination of these that conforms to the specification "Extended Facsimile Using Internet Mail" [5].
contents.zh-CHS: 术语“扩展互联网传真系统”用于描述符合规范“使用互联网邮件的扩展传真”[5]的任何软件、设备或其组合。

contents.text: "capability exchange" describes any transfer of information between communicating systems that is used to indicate system capabilities and hence determine the form of data transferred. This term covers both one-way and two-way transfers of capability information.
contents.zh-CHS: “能力交换”描述通信系统之间的任何信息传输，用于指示系统能力，从而确定传输数据的形式。该术语包括能力信息的单向和双向传输。

contents.text: "capability identification" is a particular form of capability exchange in which a receiving system provides capability information to a sending system.
contents.zh-CHS: “能力识别”是一种特殊形式的能力交换，其中接收系统向发送系统提供能力信息。

contents.text: "capability description" is a collection of data presented in some specific format that describes the capabilities of some communicating entity. It may exist separately from any specific capability exchange mechanism.
contents.zh-CHS: “能力描述”是以某种特定格式呈现的数据集合，用于描述某些通信实体的能力。它可能与任何特定的能力交换机制分开存在。

contents.text: NOTE: Comments like this provide additional nonessential information about the rationale behind this document. Such information is not needed for building a conformant implementation, but may help those who wish to understand the design in greater depth.
contents.zh-CHS: 注：此类评论提供了有关本文件背后的基本原理的其他非必要信息。构建一致性实现不需要这些信息，但可以帮助那些希望更深入地理解设计的人。

contents.text: 1.3 Discussion of this document
contents.zh-CHS: 1.3 对本文件的讨论

contents.text: Discussion of this document should take place on the Internet fax mailing list hosted by the Internet Mail Consortium (IMC). Please send comments regarding this document to:
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件的讨论应在互联网邮件联盟（IMC）托管的互联网传真邮件列表上进行。请将有关本文件的意见发送至：

contents.text: ietf-fax@imc.org
contents.zh-CHS: ietf-fax@imc.org

contents.text: To subscribe to this list, send a message with the body 'subscribe' to "ietf-fax-request@imc.org".
contents.zh-CHS: 要订阅此列表，请向“ietf传真”发送一条正文为“订阅”的消息-request@imc.org".

contents.text: To see what has gone on before you subscribed, please see the mailing list archive at:
contents.zh-CHS: 要查看订阅前的情况，请访问邮件列表存档：

contents.text: http://www.imc.org/ietf-fax/
2. Fax feature schema syntax
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 传真功能模式语法

contents.text: The syntax for the fax feature schema is described by "A syntax for describing media feature sets" [2]. This in turn calls upon media feature tags that may be registered according to the procedure described in "Media Feature Tag Registration Procedure" [1].
contents.zh-CHS: 传真功能模式的语法由“描述媒体功能集的语法”描述[2]。这进而调用可根据“媒体功能标签注册程序”[1]中描述的程序注册的媒体功能标签。

contents.text: NOTE: Media feature registration provides a base vocabulary of features that correspond to media handling capabilities. The feature set syntax provides a mechanism and format for combining these to describe combinations of features. This memo indicates those features that may be associated with extended Internet fax systems.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：介质功能注册提供了与介质处理功能相对应的基本功能词汇表。功能集语法提供了一种机制和格式，用于组合这些功能以描述功能的组合。此备忘录指出了可能与扩展Internet传真系统相关的功能。

contents.text: 3. Internet fax feature tags
contents.zh-CHS: 3. Internet传真功能标签

contents.text: This section enumerates and briefly describes a number of feature tags that are defined for use with extended Internet fax systems and applications. These tags may be used also by other systems and applications that support corresponding capabilities.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节列举并简要描述了为扩展Internet传真系统和应用程序定义的许多功能标签。这些标签也可由支持相应功能的其他系统和应用程序使用。

contents.text: The feature tags presented below are those that an extended Internet fax system is expected to recognize its ability or non-ability to handle.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面显示的功能标签是扩展Internet传真系统预期能够识别其处理能力或不处理能力的标签。

contents.text: Definitive descriptions of feature tags are indicated by reference to their registration according to the media feature registration procedure [1] (some of which are appended to this document).
contents.zh-CHS: 特征标签的最终描述通过参考其根据媒体特征注册程序[1]的注册来指示（其中一些被附加到本文档中）。

contents.text: NOTE: The presence of a feature tag in this list does not mean that an extended Internet fax system must have that capability; rather, it must recognize the feature tag and deal with it according to the capabilities that it does have.
contents.zh-CHS: 注：此列表中的功能标签并不意味着扩展Internet传真系统必须具有该功能；相反，它必须识别功能标签，并根据它所具有的功能来处理它。

contents.text: Further, an extended Internet fax system is not prevented from recognizing and offering additional feature tags. The list below is intended to provide a basic vocabulary that all extended Internet fax systems can use in a consistent fashion.
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，扩展的因特网传真系统不会被阻止识别和提供附加的特征标签。下面的列表旨在提供所有扩展Internet传真系统可以一致使用的基本词汇表。

contents.text: If an unrecognized or unused feature tag is received, the feature set matching rule (described in [2]) operates so that tag is effectively ignored.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果接收到无法识别或未使用的特征标记，则特征集匹配规则（如[2]所述）将运行，以便有效地忽略标记。

contents.text: 3.1 Image size
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1 图像大小

contents.text:
Feature tag name    Legal values
----------------    ------------
size-x              <Rational> (>0)
size-y              <Rational> (>0)
Reference: this document, Appendix A.
contents.zh-CHS: 参考：本文件附录A。

contents.text: These feature values indicate a rendered document size in inches.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些特征值以英寸为单位指示渲染的文档大小。

contents.text: Where the actual size is measured in millimetres, a conversion factor of 10/254 may be applied to yield an exact inch-based value.
contents.zh-CHS: 当实际尺寸以毫米为单位测量时，可应用10/254的转换系数以产生精确的基于英寸的值。

contents.text: 3.2 Resolution
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2 决议

contents.text:
Feature tag name    Legal values
----------------    ------------
dpi                 <Integer> (>0)
dpi-xyratio         <Rational> (>0)
Reference: "Media Features for Display, Print, and Fax" [3], and this document appendix A.
contents.zh-CHS: 参考资料：“用于显示、打印和传真的媒体功能”[3]，以及本文件附录A。

contents.text: If 'dpi-xyratio' is present and not equal to 1 then the horizontal resolution (x-axis) is indicated by the 'dpi' feature value, and the vertical resolution (y-axis) is the value of 'dpi' divided by 'dpi-xyratio'.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果存在“dpi xyratio”且不等于1，则水平分辨率（x轴）由“dpi”特征值表示，垂直分辨率（y轴）为“dpi”值除以“dpi xyratio”。

contents.text: For example, the basic Group 3 fax resolution of 200*100dpi might be indicated as:
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，200×100dpi的基本组3传真分辨率可以指示为：

contents.text: When describing resolutions for an MRC format document, the complete set of usable resolutions is listed. However, there are some restrictions on their use: (a) 100dpi resolution can be used only with multi-level images, and (b) any multi-level image resolution is required to be an integral sub-multiple of the applicable mask resolution.
contents.zh-CHS: 在描述MRC格式文档的分辨率时，会列出完整的可用分辨率集。但是，它们的使用有一些限制：（a）100dpi分辨率只能用于多级图像，以及（b）任何多级图像分辨率都必须是适用遮罩分辨率的整数倍。

contents.text: 3.3 Media type
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3 媒体类型

contents.text:
Feature tag name    Legal values
----------------    ------------
ua-media            screen
                    screen-paged
                    stationery
                    transparency
                    envelope
                    envelope-plain
                    continuous
Reference: "Media Features for Display, Print, and Fax" [3].
contents.zh-CHS: 参考：“用于显示、打印和传真的媒体功能”[3]。

contents.text: NOTE: Where the recipient indicates specific support for hard copy or soft copy media type, a sender of color image data may wish to adjust the color components (e.g. per the related rules of ITU recommendation T.42 [9]) to improve rendered image quality on that medium.
contents.zh-CHS: 注：如果接收者表示支持硬拷贝或软拷贝介质类型，彩色图像数据的发送者可能希望调整颜色成分（例如，根据ITU建议T.42[9]的相关规则），以改善该介质上的渲染图像质量。

contents.text: 3.4 Paper Size
contents.zh-CHS: 3.4 纸张尺寸

contents.text:
Feature tag name    Legal values
----------------    ------------
paper-size          A4
                    A3
                    B4
                    letter
                    legal
Reference: "Media Features for Display, Print, and Fax" [3].
contents.zh-CHS: 参考：“用于显示、打印和传真的媒体功能”[3]。

contents.text: 3.5 Color capability
contents.zh-CHS: 3.5 色彩能力

contents.text:
Feature tag name    Legal values
----------------    ------------
color               Binary  (bi-level only)
                    Limited (a limited number of colors)
                    Mapped  (palette or otherwise mapped color)
                    Grey    (grey-scale only)
                    Full    (full continuous-tone color)
Reference: "Media Features for Display, Print, and Fax" [3].
contents.zh-CHS: 参考：“用于显示、打印和传真的媒体功能”[3]。

contents.text: The intention here is to give a broad indication of color handling capabilities that might be used, for example, to select among a small number of available data resources.
contents.zh-CHS: 这里的意图是给出颜色处理能力的广泛指示，例如，可用于从少量可用数据资源中进行选择。

contents.text: The value of this feature also gives an indication of the more detailed color handling features that might be applicable (see next section).
contents.zh-CHS: 此功能的值还指示可能适用的更详细的颜色处理功能（请参阅下一节）。

contents.text: 'Binary' indicates blank-and-white, or other bi-level capability. No further qualifying feature tags are required.
contents.zh-CHS: “二进制”表示空白和白色，或其他两级功能。不需要进一步的限定功能标签。

contents.text: 'Limited' indicates a small number of distinct fixed colors, such as might be provided by a highlight printer, pen plotter or limited color display. The 'color-levels' tag should be used to indicate the number of distinct colors available.
contents.zh-CHS: “Limited”（有限）表示少量不同的固定颜色，如高亮打印机、笔式绘图仪或有限颜色显示器提供的颜色。“颜色级别”标签应用于指示可用的不同颜色的数量。

contents.text: NOTE: No ability to indicate any specific or named color is implied by this option. Some devices might use different intensity levels rather than different hues for distinction.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：此选项不表示任何特定或命名的颜色。有些设备可能会使用不同的强度级别而不是不同的色调来进行区分。

contents.text: In the context of Internet fax, 'limited' is interpreted as one-bit-per-color-sample (RGB, CMY or CMYK), depending on the color space used.
contents.zh-CHS: 在Internet传真的上下文中，“limited”被解释为每个颜色样本（RGB、CMY或CMYK）一位，具体取决于使用的颜色空间。

contents.text: 'Mapped' indicates that pixel color values are mapped in some specifiable way to a multi-component color space. The 'color-levels' tag may be used to indicate the number of distinct colors available; in its absence, sufficient levels to display a photographic image should be assumed.
contents.zh-CHS: “映射”表示像素颜色值以某种可指定的方式映射到多分量颜色空间。“颜色级别”标签可用于指示可用的不同颜色的数量；在没有它的情况下，应该假设有足够的水平来显示照片图像。

contents.text: 'Grey' indicates a continuous tone grey-scale capability.
contents.zh-CHS: “灰色”表示连续色调灰度能力。

contents.text: 'Full' indicates full continuous tone color capability.
contents.zh-CHS: “全”表示全连续色调颜色能力。

contents.text: For 'Mapped', 'Grey' and 'Full' color, additional feature tags (section 3.6) may be used to further qualify the color reproduction.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于“映射”、“灰色”和“完整”颜色，可使用附加特征标签（第3.6节）进一步限定颜色再现。

contents.text: 3.6 Color model
contents.zh-CHS: 3.6 颜色模型

contents.text:
Feature tag name    Legal values
----------------    ------------
color-levels        <integer>   (>2)
color-space         Device-RGB  (device RGB)
                    Device-CMY  (device CMY)
                    Device-CMYK (device CMYK)
                    CIELAB      (LAB per T.42 [9])
                    (may be extended by further registrations)
color-illuminant    <token>     (per ITU T.4 [13], E.6.7)
                    D50
                    D65
                    D75
                    SA
                    SC
                    F2
                    F7
                    F11
                    CTnnnn      (see below)
CIELAB-L-depth      <integer>   (>0)
CIELAB-a-depth         "
CIELAB-b-depth         "
CIELAB-L-min        <integer>
CIELAB-L-max           "
CIELAB-a-min           "
CIELAB-a-max           "
CIELAB-b-min           "
CIELAB-b-max           "
Reference: this document, appendix A.
contents.zh-CHS: 参考：本文件附录A。

contents.text: The general model for image handling (both color and non-color) is described here from a receiver's perspective; a similar model operates in the reverse direction for a scan/send perspective:
contents.zh-CHS: 本文从接收者的角度描述了图像处理（彩色和非彩色）的一般模型；对于扫描/发送透视图，类似型号的操作方向相反：

contents.text:
raw bit        pixel         color         physical
stream  -(A)-> values -(B)-> values -(C)-> rendition
- "raw bit stream" is a stream of coded bits
contents.zh-CHS: - “原始比特流”是编码比特流

contents.text: (A) indicates image coding/decoding (MH,MR,MMR,JPEG,JBIG,etc.)
contents.zh-CHS: （A） 表示图像编码/解码（MH、MR、MMR、JPEG、JBIG等）

contents.text: - "pixel values" are a single numeric value per picture element that designates the color of that element.
contents.zh-CHS: - “像素值”是每个图片元素的单个数值，用于指定该元素的颜色。

contents.text: (B) indicates pixel-to-color value mapping
contents.zh-CHS: （B） 指示像素到颜色值的映射

contents.text: - "color values" have a separate numeric value for each color component (i.e. L*, a*, b* in the case of CIELAB indicated above.)
contents.zh-CHS: - “颜色值”对于每个颜色分量都有一个单独的数值（即，对于上述CIELAB，L*、a*、b*）

contents.text: (C) indicates how the color values are related to a physical color. This involves interpretation of the color value with respect to a color model (e.g. RGB, L*a*b*, CMY, CMYK) and a color space (which is typically recipient-dependent).
contents.zh-CHS: （C） 指示颜色值与物理颜色的关系。这涉及对颜色模型（例如RGB、L*a*b*、CMY、CMYK）和颜色空间（通常取决于接收者）的颜色值的解释。

contents.text: - "physical rendition" is a color value physically realized on a display, printer or other device.
contents.zh-CHS: - “物理格式副本”是在显示器、打印机或其他设备上物理实现的颜色值。

contents.text: There are many variables that can be applied at each stage of the processing of a color image, and any may be critical to meaningful handling of that image in some circumstances. In other circumstances many of the variables may be implied (to some level of approximation) in the application that uses them (e.g. color images published on a Web page).
contents.zh-CHS: 在彩色图像处理的每个阶段都可以应用许多变量，在某些情况下，任何变量都可能对有意义地处理该图像至关重要。在其他情况下，许多变量可能隐含在使用它们的应用程序中（在某种程度上近似）（例如，网页上发布的彩色图像）。

contents.text: The color feature framework described here is intended to allow capability description at a range of granularity: feature tags which correspond to implied (or "don't care" or "unknown") feature values may simply be omitted from a capability description.
contents.zh-CHS: 此处描述的颜色特征框架旨在允许在一定粒度范围内进行能力描述：与隐含（或“不在乎”或“未知”）特征值相对应的特征标记可以简单地从能力描述中省略。

contents.text: Grey scale and bi-level images are handled within this framework as a special case, having a 1-component color model. The following features are used for describing color capabilities:
contents.zh-CHS: 灰度和二级图像作为特例在该框架内进行处理，具有单分量颜色模型。以下功能用于描述颜色功能：

contents.text: 'color-levels' indicates the number of distinct values for each picture element, and applies to all but bi-level images. For bi-level images, a value of 2 is implied.
contents.zh-CHS: “颜色级别”表示每个图片元素的不同值的数量，适用于除双级别图像以外的所有图像。对于双层图像，表示值为2。

contents.text: 'color-space' is used mainly with 'Mapped' and 'Full', but could be used with other modes if the exact color or color model used is significant. Two kinds of color space can be distinguished: device-dependent and calibrated. Device dependent spaces are named here as 'Device-xxx', and are used to indicate a color space that is defined by the receiving device. Calibrated color spaces presume the existence of a rendering system that is calibrated with respect to an indicated definition, and is capable of processing the device-independent color information accordingly.
contents.zh-CHS: “颜色空间”主要用于“映射”和“完整”，但如果使用的确切颜色或颜色模型非常重要，则可用于其他模式。可以区分两种颜色空间：设备相关颜色空间和校准颜色空间。与设备相关的空间在这里命名为“Device xxx”，用于指示接收设备定义的颜色空间。校准颜色空间假定存在根据指示定义校准的渲染系统，并且能够相应地处理与设备无关的颜色信息。

contents.text: A color-handling receiver should indicate any appropriate device color space capability in addition to any calibrated color spaces that it may support. A calibrated color space should be used when precise color matching is required in the absence of specific knowledge of the receiving system.
contents.zh-CHS: 颜色处理接收器除了可能支持的任何校准颜色空间外，还应指示任何适当的设备颜色空间能力。当在没有接收系统的具体知识的情况下需要精确的颜色匹配时，应使用校准的颜色空间。

contents.text: NOTE: In practice, although they appear to be separate concepts, the color model and color space cannot be separated. In the final analysis, a color model (RGB, CMY, etc.) must be defined with respect to some color space.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：在实践中，虽然它们看起来是独立的概念，但颜色模型和颜色空间不能分离。归根结底，必须针对某些颜色空间定义颜色模型（RGB、CMY等）。

contents.text: 'color-illuminant' indicates a CIE illuminant, using the same general form that is used for this purpose by Group 3 fax (as defined in ITU T.4 [13], section E.6.7). When the illuminant is specified by its color temperature, the token string 'CTnnnn' is used, where 'nnnn' is a decimal number that is the color temperature in Kelvins; e.g. CT7500 indicates an illuminant color temperature of 7500K.
contents.zh-CHS: “彩色发光体”表示CIE发光体，使用与第3组传真用于此目的相同的通用形式（如ITU T.4[13]第E.6.7节所定义）。当光源由其色温指定时，使用标记字符串“CTnnnn”，其中“nnnn”是一个十进制数，表示以开尔文为单位的色温；e、 g.CT7500表示7500K的光源色温。

contents.text: NOTE: ITU T.4 indicates a binary representation for color temperature values.
contents.zh-CHS: 注：ITU T.4表示色温值的二进制表示。

contents.text: In practice, much of the illuminant detail given here will probably be unused by Internet fax. The only value likely to be specified is 'D50', which is the default color illuminant for Group 3 fax.
contents.zh-CHS: 在实践中，这里给出的许多发光体细节可能不会被互联网传真使用。唯一可能指定的值是“D50”，这是第3组传真的默认颜色光源。

contents.text: 'CIELAB-L-depth', 'CIELAB-a-depth' and 'CIELAB-b-depth' indicate the number of different values that are possible for the L*, a* and b* color components respectively, and are significant only when colors are represented in a CIELAB color space. These features would be used with palletized color, or with full color where each color component has a different number of possible values.
contents.zh-CHS: “CIELAB-L-depth”、“CIELAB-a-depth”和“CIELAB-b-depth”分别表示L*、a*和b*颜色分量可能存在的不同值的数量，并且仅当颜色在CIELAB颜色空间中表示时才有效。这些功能将与托盘颜色一起使用，或与全色一起使用，其中每个颜色组件具有不同数量的可能值。

contents.text: Color depth values relate to the representation of colour values rather than the resolution of a scanning or rendering device. Thus, if 256 different L-component values can be represented then the assertion (CIELAB-L-depth<=256) is used, even if a receiving device can render only 100 distinct luminance values. (Color rendering resolution is not covered by this memo.)
contents.zh-CHS: 颜色深度值与颜色值的表示有关，而不是与扫描或渲染设备的分辨率有关。因此，如果可以表示256个不同的L分量值，则使用断言（CIELAB-L-depth<=256），即使接收设备只能呈现100个不同的亮度值。（本备忘录不包括显色分辨率。）

contents.text: The 'CIELAB-x-min' and 'CIELAB-x-max' values indicate a color gamut (i.e. a range of color values that are used or may be rendered). A gamut may be indicated in terms of the CIELAB color space even when colors are represented in some other space.
contents.zh-CHS: “CIELAB-x-min”和“CIELAB-x-max”值表示色域（即使用或可能渲染的颜色值范围）。色域可以根据CIELAB颜色空间来指示，即使在某些其他空间中表示颜色。

contents.text: 3.7 Image coding
contents.zh-CHS: 3.7 图像编码

contents.text:
Feature tag name    Legal values
----------------    ------------
image-file-         TIFF
structure           TIFF-limited
                    TIFF-minimal
                    TIFF-MRC
                    TIFF-MRC-limited
                    (may be extended by further registrations)
image-coding        MH
                    MR
                    MMR
                    JBIG
                    JPEG
                    (may be extended by further registrations)
image-coding-       JBIG-T85    (bi-level, per ITU T.85)
constraint          JBIG-T43    (multi-level, per ITU T.43)
                    JPEG-T4E    (per ITU T.4, Annex E)
                    (may be extended by further registrations)
JBIG-stripe-size    <Integer>
image-interleave    Stripe
                    Plane
color-subsampling   "1:1:1"     (no color subsampling)
                    "4:1:1"     (4:1:1 color subsampling)
Reference: this document, appendix A.
contents.zh-CHS: 参考：本文件附录A。

contents.text: 'image-file-structure' defines how the coded image data is wrapped and formatted. The following options are defined here:
contents.zh-CHS: “图像文件结构”定义编码图像数据的包装和格式化方式。此处定义了以下选项：

contents.text: o 'TIFF' indicates image data enclosed and tagged using TIFF structures described in Adobe's definition of TIFF [20].
contents.zh-CHS: o “TIFF”表示使用Adobe的TIFF定义中描述的TIFF结构封装和标记的图像数据[20]。

contents.text: o 'TIFF-limited' indicates image data structured using TIFF, but with the limitations on the placement of Image File Descriptors (IFDs) indicated in section 4.4.6 of RFC 2301 [7].
contents.zh-CHS: o “TIFF limited”表示使用TIFF结构化的图像数据，但RFC 2301[7]第4.4.6节中规定了图像文件描述符（IFD）放置的限制。

contents.text: o 'TIFF-minimal' indicates a TIFF image format that meets the IFD placement, byte ordering and bit ordering requirements of the "minimal black and white mode" described in section 3.5 of RFC 2301 [7], also known as TIFF-S.
contents.zh-CHS: o “TIFF最小”表示满足RFC 2301[7]第3.5节所述“最小黑白模式”（也称为TIFF-S）的IFD放置、字节排序和位排序要求的TIFF图像格式。

contents.text: o 'TIFF-MRC' uses a TIFF image structure [20] augmented with a sub-IFD structure, described for the "Mixed Raster Content mode" in section 8.1.2 of RFC 2301 [7], also known as TIFF-M. This provides a file structure to contain composite images constructed using the MRC model described in T.44 [15] (see tag 'MRC-mode').
contents.zh-CHS: o “TIFF-MRC”使用了一个TIFF图像结构[20]，并增加了一个子IFD结构，如RFC 2301[7]第8.1.2节中“混合光栅内容模式”所述，也称为TIFF-M。这提供了一个文件结构，以包含使用T.44[15]中所述的MRC模型构建的复合图像（见标记“MRC模式”）。

contents.text: o 'TIFF-MRC-limited' is the same as 'TIFF-MRC', except that the primary IFD (i.e. top-level IFDs, as opposed to sub-IFDs) placement is constrained in the same way as 'TIFF-limited'.
contents.zh-CHS: o “TIFF MRC limited”与“TIFF-MRC”相同，不同之处在于主要IFD（即顶级IFD，而非子IFD）的放置受到与“TIFF limited”相同的约束。

contents.text: 'image-coding' describes how raw image data is compressed and coded as a sequence of bits. These are generic tags that may apply to a range of file formats and usage environments.
contents.zh-CHS: “图像编码”描述如何将原始图像数据压缩并编码为位序列。这些是可应用于一系列文件格式和使用环境的通用标记。

contents.text: 'image-coding-constraint' describes how the raw image data coding method is constrained to meet a particular operating environment. Options defined here are JBIG and JPEG coding constraints that apply in typical Group 3 fax environments.
contents.zh-CHS: “图像编码约束”描述如何约束原始图像数据编码方法以满足特定的操作环境。此处定义的选项是JBIG和JPEG编码约束，适用于典型的第3组传真环境。

contents.text: The 'JBIG-stripe-size' feature may be used with JBIG image coding, and indicates the number of scan lines in each stripe except the last in an image. The legal constraints are:
contents.zh-CHS: “JBIG条带大小”功能可与JBIG图像编码一起使用，并指示除图像中最后一条外每条条带中的扫描线数。法律限制包括：

contents.text:
(JBIG-stripe-size=128)
(JBIG-stripe-size>=0)
The latter being equivalent to no restriction.
contents.zh-CHS: 后者相当于没有限制。

contents.text: NOTE: there are several image coding options here, and not all are required in all circumstances.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：这里有几个图像编码选项，并非所有情况下都需要。

contents.text: Specification of the image-file-structure tag value alone is not normally sufficient to describe the capabilities of a recipient. A general rule is that sufficient detail should be provided to exclude any unsupported features.
contents.zh-CHS: 仅指定图像文件结构标记值通常不足以描述收件人的功能。一般规则是，应提供足够的详细信息，以排除任何不受支持的功能。

contents.text: For extended Internet fax, image-file-structure and image-coding should always be specified, together with additional values described above as needed to clearly indicate which feature tag values are supported and which are not. (See also the examples in section 4.)
contents.zh-CHS: 对于扩展Internet传真，应始终指定图像文件结构和图像编码，并根据需要指定上述附加值，以明确指示支持哪些功能标签值，哪些不支持。（另请参见第4节中的示例。）

contents.text: 3.8 MRC mode
contents.zh-CHS: 3.8 MRC模式

contents.text:
Feature tag name    Legal values
----------------    ------------
MRC-mode            <Integer> (0..7)   (per ITU T.44 [15])
MRC-max-stripe-size <Integer>
Reference: this document, appendix A.
contents.zh-CHS: 参考：本文件附录A。

contents.text: The 'MRC-mode' feature is used to indicate the availability of MRC (mixed raster content) image format capability. A zero value indicates MRC is not available, a non-zero value indicates the maximum available MRC mode number.
contents.zh-CHS: “MRC模式”功能用于指示MRC（混合光栅内容）图像格式功能的可用性。零值表示MRC不可用，非零值表示最大可用MRC模式编号。

contents.text: An MRC formatted document is actually a collection of several images, each of which is described by a separate feature collection. An MRC-capable receiver is presumed to be capable of accepting any combination of contained images that conform to both the MRC construction rules and the image-coding capabilities declared elsewhere.
contents.zh-CHS: MRC格式的文档实际上是几个图像的集合，每个图像由单独的特征集合描述。假定具有MRC能力的接收机能够接收符合MRC构造规则和别处声明的图像编码能力的所包含图像的任何组合。

contents.text: Within an MRC-formatted document, multi-level coders are used for foreground and background images (i.e. odd-numbered layers: 1, 3, 5, etc.) and bi-level coders are used for mask layers (i.e. even numbered layers 2, 4, 6, etc.). MRC format also imposes constraints on the resolutions that can be used.
contents.zh-CHS: 在MRC格式的文档中，多级编码器用于前景和背景图像（即奇数层：1、3、5等），双层编码器用于遮罩层（即偶数层2、4、6等）。MRC格式还对可使用的分辨率施加限制。

contents.text: The 'MRC-max-stripe-size' feature may be used with MRC coding, and indicates the maximum number of scan lines in each MRC stripe. The legal constraints are:
contents.zh-CHS: “MRC最大条带大小”功能可与MRC编码一起使用，并指示每个MRC条带中的最大扫描行数。法律限制包括：

contents.text:
(MRC-max-stripe-size<=256)
(MRC-max-stripe-size>=0)
These values indicate upper bounds on the stripe size. The actual value may vary between stripes, and the actual size for each stripe is indicated in the image data.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些值表示条带大小的上限。条纹之间的实际值可能不同，并且每个条纹的实际大小在图像数据中指示。

contents.text: 4. Examples
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 例子

contents.text: The level of detail captured here reflects that used for capability identification in Group 3 facsimile.
contents.zh-CHS: 此处捕获的详细程度反映了第3组传真中用于能力识别的详细程度。

contents.text: 4.1 Simple mode Internet fax system
contents.zh-CHS: 4.1 简单模式因特网传真系统

contents.text: This example describes the capabilities of a typical simple mode Internet fax system. Note that TIFF profile S is required to be supported by such a system.
contents.zh-CHS: 本示例介绍典型的简单模式Internet传真系统的功能。请注意，此类系统需要支持TIFF配置文件S。

contents.text:
(& (image-file-structure=TIFF-minimal)
   (MRC-mode=0)
   (color=Binary)
   (image-coding=MH) (MRC-mode=0)
   (| (& (dpi=204) (dpi-xyratio=[204/98,204/196]) )
      (& (dpi=200) (dpi-xyratio=[200/100,1]) ) )
   (size-x<=2150/254)
   (paper-size=A4)
(ua-media=stationery) )
contents.zh-CHS: （ua媒体=文具）

contents.text: 4.2 High-end black-and-white Internet fax system
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2 高端黑白互联网传真系统

contents.text: This would include support for B/W JBIG and be equivalent to what is sometimes called "Super G3", except that Internet fax functionality would be added.
contents.zh-CHS: 这将包括对B/W JBIG的支持，并等同于有时所谓的“超级G3”，只是将添加Internet传真功能。

contents.text:
(& (image-file-structure=TIFF)
   (MRC-mode=0)
   (color=Binary)
   (| (& (dpi=204) (dpi-xyratio=[204/98,204/196]) )
      (& (dpi=200) (dpi-xyratio=[200/100,1]) )
      (& (dpi=300) (dpi-xyratio=1) ) )
   (| (image-coding=[MH,MR,MMR])
      (& (image-coding=JBIG)
         (image-coding-constraint=JBIG-T85)
         (JBIG-stripe-size=128) ) )
   (size-x<=2150/254)
   (paper-size=[letter,A4,B4]) )
   (ua-media=stationery) )
4.3 Grey-scale Internet fax system
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3 灰阶因特网传真系统

contents.text: This is the previous example extended to handle grey scale multi-level images. In keeping with Group 3 fax, this example requires equal x- and y- resolutions for a multi-level image.
contents.zh-CHS: 这是前一个扩展用于处理灰度级多级图像的示例。为了与第3组传真保持一致，此示例要求多级图像的x和y分辨率相等。

contents.text:
(& (image-file-structure=TIFF)
   (MRC-mode=0)
   (| (& (color=Binary)
         (| (image-coding=[MH,MR,MMR])
            (& (image-coding=JBIG)
               (image-coding-constraint=JBIG-T85)
               (JBIG-stripe-size=128) ) )
         (| (& (dpi=204) (dpi-xyratio=[204/98,204/196]) )
            (& (dpi=200) (dpi-xyratio=[200/100,1]) )
            (& (dpi=300) (dpi-xyratio=1) ) )
      (& (color=Grey)
         (color-levels<=256)
         (color-space-CIELAB)
         (color-illuminant=D50)
         (CIELAB-L-min>=0)
         (CIELAB-L-max<=100)
         (| (& (image-coding=JPEG)
               (image-coding-constraint=JPEG-T4E) )
            (& (image-coding=JBIG)
               (image-coding-constraint=JBIG-T43)

(JBIG-stripe-size=128)
            (image-interleave=stripe) ) )
      (dpi=[100,200,300]) (dpi-xyratio=1) ) )
(size-x<=2150/254)
(paper-size=[letter,A4,B4]) )
(ua-media=stationery) )
4.4 Full-color Internet fax system (JPEG only)
contents.zh-CHS: 4.4 全彩色互联网传真系统（仅JPEG）

contents.text: This adds 24-bit full-color to the previous example.
contents.zh-CHS: 这为前面的示例添加了24位全彩。

contents.text:
(& (image-file-structure=TIFF)
   (MRC-mode=0)
   (| (& (color=Binary)
         (image-coding=[MH,MR,MMR])
         (| (& (dpi=204) (dpi-xyratio=[204/98,204/196]) )
            (& (dpi=200) (dpi-xyratio=[200/100,1]) )
            (& (dpi=300) (dpi-xyratio=1) ) ) )
      (& (color=grey)
         (image-coding=JPEG)
         (image-coding-constraint=JPEG-T4E)
         (color-levels<=256)
         (color-space=CIELAB)
         (color-illuminant=D50)
         (CIELAB-L-min>=0)
         (CIELAB-L-max<=100)
         (dpi=[100,200,300]) (dpi-xyratio=1) )
      (& (color=full)
         (image-coding=JPEG)
         (image-coding-constraint=JPEG-T4E)
         (color-subsampling=["1:1:1","4:1:1"])
         (color-levels<=16777216)
         (color-space=CIELAB)
         (color-illuminant=D50)
         (CIELAB-L-min>=0)
         (CIELAB-L-max<=100)
         (CIELAB-a-min>=-85)
         (CIELAB-a-max<=85)
         (CIELAB-b-min>=-75)
         (CIELAB-b-max<=125)
         (dpi=[100,200,300]) (dpi-xyratio=1) ) )
   (size-x<=2150/254)
   (paper-size=[letter,A4,B4]) )
   (ua-media=stationery) )
4.5 Full-color Internet fax system (JPEG and JBIG)
contents.zh-CHS: 4.5 全彩色互联网传真系统（JPEG和JBIG）

contents.text: This adds limited CMY(K), RGB and 16-bit mapped color using JBIG coding to the previous example.
contents.zh-CHS: 这将使用JBIG编码将有限的CMY（K）、RGB和16位映射颜色添加到前面的示例中。

contents.text:
(& (image-file-structure=TIFF)
   (MRC-mode=0)
   (| (& (color=Binary)
         (| (image-coding=[MH,MR,MMR])
            (& (image-coding=JBIG)
               (image-coding-constraint=JBIG-T85)
               (JBIG-stripe-size=128) ) )
         (| (& (dpi=204) (dpi-xyratio=[204/98,204/196]) )
            (& (dpi=200) (dpi-xyratio=[200/100,1]) )
            (& (dpi=300) (dpi-xyratio=1) ) ) )
      (& (color=Limited)
         (image-coding=JBIG)
         (image-coding-constraint=JBIG-T43)
         (JBIG-stripe-size=128)
         (image-interleave=stripe)
         (| (& (color-space=[Device-RGB,Device-CMY])
               (color-levels<=8) )
            (& (color-space=Device-CMYK)
               (color-levels<=16) ) )
         (dpi=[100,200,300]) (dpi-xyratio=1) )
      (& (color=Mapped)
         (image-coding=JBIG)
         (image-coding-constraint=JBIG-T43)
         (JBIG-stripe-size=128)
         (image-interleave=stripe)
         (color-levels<=65536)
         (color-space=CIELAB)
         (color-illuminant=D50)
         (CIELAB-L-min>=0)
         (CIELAB-L-max<=100)
         (CIELAB-a-min>=-85)
         (CIELAB-a-max<=85)
         (CIELAB-b-min>=-75)
         (CIELAB-b-max<=125)
         (dpi=[100,200,300]) (dpi-xyratio=1) )
      (& (color=grey)
         (| (& (image-coding=JPEG)
               (image-coding-constraint=JPEG-T4E) )
            (& (image-coding=JBIG)
               (image-coding-constraint=JBIG-T43)
               (JBIG-stripe-size=128)
               (image-interleave=stripe) ) )
         (color-levels<=256)

(color-space=CIELAB)
      (color-illuminant=D50)
      (CIELAB-L-min>=0)
      (CIELAB-L-max<=100)
      (dpi=[100,200,300]) (dpi-xyratio=1) )
   (& (color=full)
      (| (& (image-coding=JPEG)
            (image-coding-constraint=JPEG-T4E)
            (color-subsampling=["1:1:1","4:1:1"]) )
         (& (image-coding=JBIG)
            (image-coding-constraint=JBIG-T43)
            (JBIG-stripe-size=128)
            (image-interleave=stripe) ) )
      (color-levels<=16777216)
      (color-space=CIELAB)
      (color-illuminant=D50)
      (CIELAB-L-min>=0)
      (CIELAB-L-max<=100)
      (CIELAB-a-min>=-85)
      (CIELAB-a-max<=85)
      (CIELAB-b-min>=-75)
      (CIELAB-b-max<=125)
      (dpi=[100,200,300]) (dpi-xyratio=1) ) )
(size-x<=2150/254)
(paper-size=[letter,A4,B4]) )
(ua-media=stationery) )
4.6 Full-color Internet fax system (MRC)
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6 全彩色互联网传真系统（MRC）

contents.text: This adds MRC image structures to the previous example.
contents.zh-CHS: 这将在前面的示例中添加MRC图像结构。

contents.text:
(& (image-file-structure=TIFF-MRC)
   (MRC-mode<=1) (MRC-max-stripe-size>=0)
   (| (& (color=binary)
         (| (image-coding=[MH,MR,MMR])
            (& (image-coding=JBIG)
               (image-coding-constraint=JBIG-T85)
               (JBIG-stripe-size=128) ) )
         (| (& (dpi=204) (dpi-xyratio=[204/98,204/196]) )
            (& (dpi=200) (dpi-xyratio=[200/100,1]) )
            (& (dpi=[300,400]) (dpi-xyratio=1) ) ) )
      (& (color=limited)
         (| (& (color-space=[Device-RGB,Device-CMY])
               (color-levels<=8) ) )
         (| (& (color-space=Device-CMYK)
               (color-levels<=16) ) )
         (image-coding=JBIG)
         (image-coding-constraint=JBIG-T43)

(JBIG-stripe-size=128)
   (image-interleave=stripe)
   (dpi=[100,200,300,400]) (dpi-xyratio=1) )
(& (color=mapped)
   (color-levels<=65536)
   (image-coding=JBIG)
   (image-coding-constraint=JBIG-T43)
   (JBIG-stripe-size=128)
   (image-interleave=stripe)
   (color-space=CIELAB)
   (CIELAB-L-min>=0)
   (CIELAB-L-max<=100)
   (CIELAB-a-min>=-85)
   (CIELAB-a-max<=85)
   (CIELAB-b-min>=-75)
   (CIELAB-b-max<=125) ) )
   (color-illuminant=D50)
   (dpi=[100,200,300,400]) (dpi-xyratio=1) )
(& (color=grey)
   (| (& (image-coding=JPEG)
         (image-coding-constraint=JPEG-T4E) )
      (& (image-coding=JBIG)
         (image-coding-constraint=JBIG-T43)
         (JBIG-stripe-size=128)
         (image-interleave=stripe) ) )
   (color-space=CIELAB)
   (color-levels<=256)
   (color-illuminant=D50)
   (CIELAB-L-min>=0)
   (CIELAB-L-max<=100)
   (dpi=[100,200,300,400]) (dpi-xyratio=1) )
(& (color=full)
   (| (& (image-coding=JPEG)
         (image-coding-constraint=JPEG-T4E)
         (color-subsampling=["1:1:1","4:1:1"]) )
      (& (image-coding=JBIG)
         (image-coding-constraint=JBIG-T43)
         (JBIG-stripe-size=128)
         (image-interleave=stripe) ) )
   (color-levels<=16777216)
   (color-space=CIELAB)
   (color-illuminant=D50)
   (CIELAB-L-min>=0)
   (CIELAB-L-max<=100)
   (CIELAB-a-min>=-85)
   (CIELAB-a-max<=85)
   (CIELAB-b-min>=-75)
   (CIELAB-b-max<=125)

(dpi=[100,200,300,400]) (dpi-xyratio=1) ) )
(size-x<=2550/254)
(Paper-size=[Letter,A4,B4])
(ua-media=stationery) )
4.7 Sender and receiver feature matching
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7 发送方和接收方特征匹配

contents.text: This example considers sending a document to an enhanced black-and-white fax system with the following receiver capabilities:
contents.zh-CHS: 此示例考虑将文档发送到具有以下接收器功能的增强型黑白传真系统：

contents.text:
(& (| (& (dpi=200) (dpi-xyatio=200/100) )
      (& (dpi=200) (dpi-xyratio=1) )
      (& (dpi=300) (dpi-xyratio=1) )
      (& (dpi=400) (dpi-xyratio=1) ) )
   (color=Binary)
   (| (& (paper-size=A4) (ua-media=[stationery,transparency]) )
      (& (paper-size=B4) (ua-media=continuous) ) )
   (image-coding=[MH,MR,JBIG]) )
Turning to the document itself, assume it is available to the sender in three possible formats, A4 high resolution, B4 low resolution and A4 high resolution color, described by:
contents.zh-CHS: 关于文档本身，假设发送方可以使用三种可能的格式，A4高分辨率、B4低分辨率和A4高分辨率颜色，如下所述：

contents.text: (& (dpi=300) (dpi-xyratio=1) (color=Binary) (paper-size=A4) (image-coding=[MMR,JBIG]) )
contents.zh-CHS: （&（dpi=300）（dpi xyratio=1）（颜色=二进制）（纸张大小=A4）（图像编码=[MMR，JBIG]））

contents.text:
(& (dpi=200) (dpi-xyratio=200/100)
   (color=Binary)
   (paper-size=B4)
   (image-coding=[MH,MR]) )

(& (dpi=300) (dpi-xyratio=1)
   (color=Mapped) (color-levels<=256)
   (paper-size=A4)
   (image-coding=JPEG) )
These three image formats can be combined into a composite capability statement by a logical-OR operation (to describe format-1 OR format-2 OR format-3):
contents.zh-CHS: 这三种图像格式可以通过逻辑OR操作组合成一个复合功能语句（用于描述格式1、格式2或格式3）：

contents.text:
(| (& (dpi=300) (dpi-xyratio=1)
      (color=Binary)
      (paper-size=A4)
      (image-coding=[MMR,JBIG]) )
   (& (dpi=200) (dpi-xyratio=200/100)
      (color=Binary)

(paper-size=B4)
   (image-coding=[MH,MR]) )
(& (dpi=300) (dpi-xyratio=1)
   (color=Mapped) (color-levels=42)
   (paper-size=A4)
   (image-coding=JPEG) ) )
This could be simplified, but there is little gain in doing so at this point.
contents.zh-CHS: 这可以简化，但在这一点上这样做几乎没有什么好处。

contents.text: The composite document description can be matched with the receiver capability description, according to the rules in [2], to yield the result:
contents.zh-CHS: 根据[2]中的规则，复合文档描述可以与接收方能力描述匹配，以得到以下结果：

contents.text:
(| (& (dpi=300) (dpi-xyratio=1)
      (color=Binary)
      (paper-size=A4)
      (ua-media=[stationery,transparency])
      (image-coding=JBIG) )
   (& (dpi=200) (dpi-xyratio=200/100)
      (color=Binary)
      (paper-size=B4)
      (ua-media=continuous)
      (image-coding=[MH,MR]) ) )
Points to note about the feature matching process:
contents.zh-CHS: 有关特征匹配过程的注意事项：

contents.text: o The color document option is eliminated because the receiver cannot handle either color (indicated by '(color=Mapped)') or JPEG coding (indicated by '(image-coding=JPEG)').
contents.zh-CHS: o 由于接收器无法处理颜色（由“（color=Mapped）”表示）或JPEG编码（由“（image coding=JPEG）”表示），因此取消了“彩色文档”选项。

contents.text: o The high resolution version of the document with '(dpi=300)' must be send using '(image-coding=JBIG)' because this is the only available coding of the image data that the receiver can use for high resolution documents. (The available 300dpi document codings here are MMR and JBIG, and the receiver capabilities are MH, MR and JBIG.)
contents.zh-CHS: o 必须使用“（image coding=JBIG）”发送带有“（dpi=300）”的文档的高分辨率版本，因为这是接收器可用于高分辨率文档的唯一可用图像数据编码。（此处可用的300dpi文档编码为MMR和JBIG，接收器功能为MH、MR和JBIG。）

contents.text: o The low-resolution version of the document can be sent with either MH or MR coding as the receiver can deal with either of these for low resolution documents.
contents.zh-CHS: o 文件的低分辨率版本可以通过MH或MR编码发送，因为接收者可以处理低分辨率文件的这两种编码。

contents.text: o The high resolution variant of the document is available only for A4, so that is the paper-size used in that case. Similarly the low resolution version is sent for B4 paper.
contents.zh-CHS: o 文档的高分辨率变体仅适用于A4，因此在这种情况下使用的纸张尺寸为A4。同样，低分辨率版本也用于B4纸张。

contents.text: o Even though the sender may not understand the 'ua-media' feature tag, and does not mention it, the matching rules preserve the
contents.zh-CHS: o 即使发送方可能不理解“ua media”功能标签，也没有提及它，但匹配规则保留

contents.text: constraint that the B4 document is rendered with '(ua-media=continuous)', and the A4 document may be rendered with '(ua-media=[stationery,transparency])'.
contents.zh-CHS: B4文档使用“（ua媒体=连续）”呈现，A4文档可以使用“（ua媒体=[信纸，透明度]）呈现的约束。

contents.text: Finally, note that when matching an MRC document description, the description of each component sub-image must match the capabilities of the intended receiver.
contents.zh-CHS: 最后，请注意，当匹配MRC文档描述时，每个组件子映像的描述必须与预期接收器的功能匹配。

contents.text: 5. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 5. IANA考虑

contents.text: Appendix A of this document repeats the descriptions of feature tags introduced by RFC 2531 [22], with some small revisions. These have been registered in the "IETF tree", according to the procedure described in section 3.1.1 of "Media Feature Tag Registration Procedure" [1] (i.e. these feature tags are subject to the "IETF Consensus" policies described in RFC 2434 [21]).
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件附录A重复了RFC 2531[22]引入的特征标签的描述，并进行了一些小的修订。根据“媒体功能标签注册程序”[1]第3.1.1节中所述的程序（即，这些功能标签受RFC 2434[21]中所述的“IETF共识”政策约束），已在“IETF树”中注册。

contents.text: Appendix section A.5 introduces one new feature tag (color-illuminant) to be registered according to the same procedure. An ASN.1 identifier should be assigned for this new tag and replaced in the body of the registration.
contents.zh-CHS: 附录A.5节介绍了根据相同程序注册的一个新特征标签（彩色光源）。应为此新标签分配ASN.1标识符，并在注册正文中替换。

contents.text: 6. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 安全考虑

contents.text: The points raised below are in addition to the general security considerations for extended Internet fax [5], and others discussed in [2,8,11,12,13]
6.1 Capability descriptions and mechanisms
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1 能力描述和机制

contents.text: Negotiation mechanisms reveal information about one party to other parties. This may raise privacy concerns, and may allow a malicious party to make better guesses about the presence of specific security holes.
contents.zh-CHS: 谈判机制将一方的信息透露给另一方。这可能会引起隐私问题，并可能允许恶意方更好地猜测是否存在特定的安全漏洞。

contents.text: Most of these concerns pertain to capability information getting into the hands of someone who may abuse it. This document specifies capabilities that help a sender to determine what image characteristics can be processed by the recipient, not mechanisms for their publication. Implementers and users should take care that the mechanisms employed ensure that capabilities are revealed only to appropriate persons, systems and agents.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些问题大多与能力信息落入可能滥用它的人手中有关。本文档指定了帮助发送者确定接收者可以处理哪些图像特征的功能，而不是它们的发布机制。实施者和用户应注意使用的机制确保仅向适当的人员、系统和代理透露能力。

contents.text: 6.2 Specific threats
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2 具体威胁

contents.text: 1. Unsolicited bulk mail: if it is known that a recipient can process certain types of images, they may be targeted by bulk mailers that want to send such images.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 未经请求的批量邮件：如果已知收件人可以处理某些类型的图像，则希望发送此类图像的批量邮件可能会以这些图像为目标。

Appendix A: Feature registrations
contents.zh-CHS: 附录A：功能注册

contents.text: A.1 Image size
contents.zh-CHS: A.1图像大小

contents.text: - Media Feature tag name(s):
contents.zh-CHS: - 媒体功能标签名称：

contents.text: size-x size-y
contents.zh-CHS: 尺寸x尺寸y

contents.text: - ASN.1 identifiers associated with these feature tags:
contents.zh-CHS: - ASN.1与这些特征标签相关的标识符：

contents.text: - Summary of the media features indicated:
contents.zh-CHS: - 显示的媒体功能摘要：

contents.text: These feature tags indicate the size of a displayed, printed or otherwise rendered document image; they indicate horizontal (size-x) and vertical (size-y) dimensions.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些特征标签指示显示、打印或以其他方式渲染的文档图像的大小；它们表示水平（尺寸-x）和垂直（尺寸-y）尺寸。

contents.text: The unit of measure is inches (to be consistent with the measure of resolution defined by the feature tag 'dpi').
contents.zh-CHS: 测量单位为英寸（与特征标签“dpi”定义的分辨率测量一致）。

contents.text: Where the actual size is available in millimetres, a conversion factor of 10/254 may be applied to yield an exact inch-based value.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果实际尺寸以毫米为单位，则可采用10/254的转换系数，以得出精确的基于英寸的值。

contents.text: - Values appropriate for use with these feature tags:
contents.zh-CHS: - 适合与这些要素标记一起使用的值：

contents.text: Rational (>0)
contents.zh-CHS: Rational（>0）

contents.text: - The feature tag is intended primarily for use in the following applications, protocols, services, or negotiation mechanisms:
contents.zh-CHS: - 功能标签主要用于以下应用程序、协议、服务或协商机制：

contents.text: Print and display applications where different media choices will be made depending on the size of the recipient device.
contents.zh-CHS: 打印和显示应用程序，其中将根据收件人设备的大小选择不同的媒体。

contents.text: - Examples of typical use:
contents.zh-CHS: - 典型使用示例：

contents.text: This example describes the maximum scanned image width and height for Group 3 fax: 215x297 mm (8.46x11.69 inches):
contents.zh-CHS: 本示例介绍第3组传真的最大扫描图像宽度和高度：215x297 mm（8.46x11.69英寸）：

contents.text: - Related standards or documents:
contents.zh-CHS: - 相关标准或文件：

contents.text: The memo "Media Features for Display, Print, and Fax" [3] describes features (pix-x, pix-y) for measuring document size in pixels.
contents.zh-CHS: 备忘录“用于显示、打印和传真的媒体功能”[3]描述了以像素为单位测量文档大小的功能（pix-x、pix-y）。

contents.text: Fax applications should declare physical dimensions using the features defined here.
contents.zh-CHS: 传真应用程序应使用此处定义的功能声明物理尺寸。

contents.text: - Considerations particular to use in individual applications, protocols, services, or negotiation mechanisms:
contents.zh-CHS: - 在单个应用程序、协议、服务或协商机制中使用的特殊注意事项：

contents.text: Where no physical size is known or available, but a pixel size is known, a notional size should be declared based upon known pixel dimensions and a notional resolution of (say) 100dpi
contents.zh-CHS: 如果没有已知或可用的物理尺寸，但已知像素尺寸，则应根据已知像素尺寸和（比如）100dpi的名义分辨率来声明名义尺寸

contents.text: For example, to describe a 640x480 pixel display:
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，要描述640x480像素显示器：

contents.text: The notional 100dpi resolution is used as it represents a fairly typical resolution for a pixel-limited display. Reducing the rational numbers to canonical form gives the following equivalent expression:
contents.zh-CHS: 使用概念上的100dpi分辨率是因为它代表了像素受限显示器的相当典型的分辨率。将有理数减少为标准形式，得到以下等价表达式：

contents.text: - Interoperability considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: - 互操作性注意事项：

contents.text: For interoperability with other (non-fax) applications that use only pixel-based measurements, pixel dimensions (pix-x, pix-y) may be declared in addition to physical measurements.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了与仅使用基于像素的测量的其他（非传真）应用程序的互操作性，除了物理测量之外，还可以声明像素尺寸（pix-x、pix-y）。

contents.text: - Related feature tags:
contents.zh-CHS: - 相关功能标签：

contents.text:
pix-x                 [3]
pix-y                 [3]

contents.zh-CHS: - 预期用途：

contents.text: Common
contents.zh-CHS: 常见的

contents.text: - Author/Change controller:
contents.zh-CHS: - 作者/变更控制员：

contents.text: IETF
contents.zh-CHS: IETF

contents.text: A.2 Resolution aspect ratio
contents.zh-CHS: A.2分辨率纵横比

contents.text: - Media Feature tag name(s):
contents.zh-CHS: - 媒体功能标签名称：

contents.text: dpi-xyratio
contents.zh-CHS: dpi比率

contents.text: - ASN.1 identifier associated with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 与此功能标签关联的ASN.1标识符：

contents.text: - Summary of the media features indicated:
contents.zh-CHS: - 显示的媒体功能摘要：

contents.text: This feature is used to indicate differential horizontal and vertical resolution capability. In the absence of this feature, horizontal and vertical resolutions are presumed to be the same.
contents.zh-CHS: 此功能用于指示差分水平和垂直分辨率能力。如果没有此功能，则假定水平分辨率和垂直分辨率相同。

contents.text: When this feature tag is specified, any declared resolution (dpi) is presumed to apply to the horizontal axis, and the vertical resolution is obtained by dividing that declared resolution by the resolution ratio.
contents.zh-CHS: 指定此特征标记时，假定任何声明的分辨率（dpi）适用于水平轴，垂直分辨率通过将声明的分辨率除以分辨率比获得。

contents.text: The value of this feature is a pure number, since it represents the ratio of two resolution values.
contents.zh-CHS: 此功能的值是一个纯数字，因为它表示两个分辨率值的比率。

contents.text: - Values appropriate for use with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 适用于此功能标记的值：

contents.text: Rational (>0)
contents.zh-CHS: Rational（>0）

contents.text: - The feature tag is intended primarily for use in the following applications, protocols, services, or negotiation mechanisms:
contents.zh-CHS: - 功能标签主要用于以下应用程序、协议、服务或协商机制：

contents.text: Internet fax, and other print or display applications that must handle differential horizontal and vertical resolution values.
contents.zh-CHS: Internet传真和其他必须处理不同水平和垂直分辨率值的打印或显示应用程序。

contents.text: - Examples of typical use:
contents.zh-CHS: - 典型使用示例：

contents.text: The following example describes a fax resolution of 204 dpi horizontally by 391 dpi vertically:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下示例描述了水平方向204 dpi、垂直方向391 dpi的传真分辨率：

contents.text: - Related standards or documents:
contents.zh-CHS: - 相关标准或文件：

contents.text: The memo "Media Features for Display, Print, and Fax" [3] describes a feature (dpi) for measuring document resolution.
contents.zh-CHS: 备忘录“用于显示、打印和传真的媒体功能”[3]描述了用于测量文档分辨率的功能（dpi）。

contents.text: - Interoperability considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: - 互操作性注意事项：

contents.text: When interoperating with an application that does not recognize the differential resolution feature, resolution matching may be performed on the basis of the horizontal resolution only, so aspect ratio information may be lost.
contents.zh-CHS: 当与不识别差分分辨率特征的应用程序互操作时，可能仅基于水平分辨率执行分辨率匹配，因此可能丢失纵横比信息。

contents.zh-CHS: - 相关功能标签：

contents.text: IETF
contents.zh-CHS: IETF

contents.text: A.3 Color levels
contents.zh-CHS: A.3颜色级别

contents.text: - Media Feature tag name(s):
contents.zh-CHS: - 媒体功能标签名称：

contents.text: color-levels
contents.zh-CHS: 色阶

contents.text: - ASN.1 identifier associated with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 与此功能标签关联的ASN.1标识符：

contents.text: - Summary of the media features indicated:
contents.zh-CHS: - 显示的媒体功能摘要：

contents.text: This feature tag is used to indicate a number of different image data pixel color values.
contents.zh-CHS: 此功能标签用于指示许多不同的图像数据像素颜色值。

contents.text: When mapped (palletized) color is used, this is generally different from the number of different colors that can be represented through the color mapping function.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用映射（托盘化）颜色时，这通常与通过颜色映射功能可以表示的不同颜色的数量不同。

contents.text: This feature tag is used in conjunction with a 'color' feature having a value other than 'Binary'.
contents.zh-CHS: 此功能标签与值不是“二进制”的“颜色”功能一起使用。

contents.text: - Values appropriate for use with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 适用于此功能标记的值：

contents.text: Integer (>=2)
- The feature tag is intended primarily for use in the following applications, protocols, services, or negotiation mechanisms:
contents.zh-CHS: - 功能标签主要用于以下应用程序、协议、服务或协商机制：

contents.text: Color image printing or display applications where the data resource used may depend upon color handling capabilities of the recipient.
contents.zh-CHS: 彩色图像打印或显示应用程序，其中使用的数据资源可能取决于收件人的颜色处理能力。

contents.text: - Examples of typical use:
contents.zh-CHS: - 典型使用示例：

contents.text:
To describe recipient capabilities:
(& (color=limited) (color-levels<=6) )
(& (color=grey)    (color-levels<=64) )
(& (color=mapped)  (color-levels<=240) )
(& (color=full)    (color-levels<=16777216) )

To describe capabilities used by a document:
(& (color=limited) (color-levels=4) )
(& (color=grey)    (color-levels=48) )
(& (color=mapped)  (color-levels=100) )
(& (color=full)    (color-levels=32768) )
- Related standards or documents:
contents.zh-CHS: - 相关标准或文件：

contents.text: The memo "Media Features for Display, Print, and Fax" [3] describes a feature (color) for indicating basic color capabilities.
contents.zh-CHS: 备忘录“用于显示、打印和传真的媒体功能”[3]描述了用于指示基本颜色功能的功能（颜色）。

contents.text: - Interoperability considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: - 互操作性注意事项：

contents.text: The actual number of color values used by a document does not, in general, exactly match the number that can be handled by a recipient. To achieve a feature match, at least one must be declared as an inequality (i.e. not both as equalities).
contents.zh-CHS: 通常，文档使用的颜色值的实际数量与收件人可以处理的数量不完全匹配。要实现特征匹配，必须至少将一个声明为不等式（即，不能同时声明为等式）。

contents.text: It is recommended that a recipient declares the number of color values that it can handle as an inequality (<=), and a data resource declares the number of colors that it uses with an equality, as shown in the examples above.
contents.zh-CHS: 建议接收者声明它可以作为不相等（<=）处理的颜色值的数量，数据资源声明它使用相等的颜色的数量，如上面的示例所示。

contents.text: - Security considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: - 安全考虑：

contents.text: - Privacy concerns, related to exposure of personal information: Where feature matching is used to select content applicable to the physical abilities of a user, unusual values for this feature tag might give an indication of a user's restricted abilities.
contents.zh-CHS: - 与个人信息披露相关的隐私问题：如果使用功能匹配来选择适用于用户物理能力的内容，则此功能标签的异常值可能表示用户的受限能力。

contents.text: - Related feature tags:
contents.zh-CHS: - 相关功能标签：

contents.text: color [3] color-space [this document]
contents.zh-CHS: 颜色[3]颜色空间[本文档]

contents.text: - Intended usage:
contents.zh-CHS: - 预期用途：

contents.text: Internet fax Color image scanning/rendering applications
contents.zh-CHS: Internet传真彩色图像扫描/渲染应用程序

contents.text: - Author/Change controller:
contents.zh-CHS: - 作者/变更控制员：

contents.text: IETF
contents.zh-CHS: IETF

contents.text: A.4 Color space
contents.zh-CHS: A.4颜色空间

contents.text: - Media Feature tag name(s):
contents.zh-CHS: - 媒体功能标签名称：

contents.text: color-space
contents.zh-CHS: 色彩空间

contents.text: - ASN.1 identifier associated with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 与此功能标签关联的ASN.1标识符：

contents.text: - Summary of the media features indicated:
contents.zh-CHS: - 显示的媒体功能摘要：

contents.text: This feature indicates a color space.
contents.zh-CHS: 此功能指示颜色空间。

contents.text: A color space value provides two types of information: o the color model used to represent a color value, including the number of color components o a mapping between color values and their physical realizations
contents.zh-CHS: 颜色空间值提供两种类型的信息：o用于表示颜色值的颜色模型，包括颜色组件的数量o颜色值与其物理实现之间的映射

contents.text: Device color space values are defined for applications where the general color representation used is significant, but exact color rendering is left to the device used. Device color spaces defined here have values of the form 'Device-xxx'.
contents.zh-CHS: 设备颜色空间值是为应用程序定义的，在这些应用程序中，所使用的一般颜色表示非常重要，但精确的颜色渲染由所使用的设备决定。此处定义的设备颜色空间的值形式为“Device xxx”。

contents.text: Calibrated color space values are provided for use with a rendering system that is calibrated with respect to some indicated definition, and capable of processing device-independent color information accordingly.
contents.zh-CHS: 校准的颜色空间值用于渲染系统，渲染系统根据某些指示的定义进行校准，并且能够相应地处理与设备无关的颜色信息。

contents.text: - Values appropriate for use with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 适用于此功能标记的值：

contents.text: Token
contents.zh-CHS: 代币

contents.text: Device color Device-RGB (device dependent RGB) spaces: Device-CMY (device dependent CMY) Device-CMYK (device dependent CMYK)
contents.zh-CHS: 设备颜色设备RGB（设备相关RGB）空间：设备CMY（设备相关CMY）设备CMYK（设备相关CMYK）

contents.text: Calibrated color CIELAB (per T.42 [9]) space:
contents.zh-CHS: 校准颜色CIELAB（根据T.42[9]）空间：

contents.text: (may be extended by further registrations)
contents.zh-CHS: （可通过进一步注册延长）

contents.text: 'Color-space=CIELAB' indicates the CIE L*a*b* colour space, using CIED50 illuminant and its perfectly diffuse reflecting white point (per T.42 [9]).
contents.zh-CHS: “颜色空间=CIELAB”表示CIE L*a*b*颜色空间，使用CIED50光源及其完全漫反射白点（根据T.42[9]）。

contents.text: - The feature tag is intended primarily for use in the following applications, protocols, services, or negotiation mechanisms:
contents.zh-CHS: - 功能标签主要用于以下应用程序、协议、服务或协商机制：

contents.text: Color image printing and display applications where the data resource used may depend upon color handling capabilities of the recipient.
contents.zh-CHS: 彩色图像打印和显示应用程序，其中使用的数据资源可能取决于收件人的颜色处理能力。

contents.text: Scanning applications where the data transferred may depend upon the image generation capabilities of the originator.
contents.zh-CHS: 传输数据的扫描应用程序可能取决于发端人的图像生成能力。

contents.text: - Examples of typical use:
contents.zh-CHS: - 典型使用示例：

contents.text: To describe rendering or scanning capabilities:
contents.zh-CHS: 要描述渲染或扫描功能，请执行以下操作：

contents.text: (color-space=[Device-RGB,CIELAB])
contents.zh-CHS: （颜色空间=[设备RGB，CIELAB]）

contents.text: To describe capabilities assumed by a document for which approximate color reproduction is required:
contents.zh-CHS: 描述需要近似颜色复制的文档所假定的能力：

contents.text: (color-space=Device-RGB)
contents.zh-CHS: （颜色空间=设备RGB）

contents.text: To describe capabilities assumed by a document for which exact color reproduction is required:
contents.zh-CHS: 描述需要精确颜色再现的文档所假定的能力：

contents.text: (color-space=CIELAB)
contents.zh-CHS: （颜色空间=CIELAB）

contents.text: - Related standards or documents:
contents.zh-CHS: - 相关标准或文件：

contents.text: CIELAB color space is defined in [19]
contents.zh-CHS: CIELAB颜色空间在[19]中定义

contents.text: CIELAB use for fax is described in ITU T.42 [9]
contents.zh-CHS: ITU T.42[9]中描述了传真的CIELAB用途

contents.text: - Interoperability considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: - 互操作性注意事项：

contents.text: A color-handling receiver should indicate any appropriate device color space capability, in addition to any calibrated color spaces that it may support.
contents.zh-CHS: 颜色处理接收器应指示任何适当的设备颜色空间能力，以及它可能支持的任何校准颜色空间。

contents.text: Calibrated color spaces are intended to be used when precise color matching is required; otherwise, if applicable, a device color space (color-space=Device-xxx) should be indicated.
contents.zh-CHS: 当需要精确的颜色匹配时，应使用校准的颜色空间；否则，如果适用，应指示设备颜色空间（颜色空间=设备xxx）。

contents.text: Documents for which exact color matching is not important should indicate a device color space capability, if applicable.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果适用，精确颜色匹配不重要的文档应说明设备颜色空间能力。

contents.text: These principles allow sender/receiver feature matching to be achieved when exact color matching is not required.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些原则允许发送方/接收方在不需要精确颜色匹配的情况下实现特征匹配。

contents.text: - Security considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: - 安全考虑：

contents.text: - Privacy concerns, related to exposure of personal information: Where feature matching is used to select content applicable to the physical abilities of a user, unusual values for this feature tag might give an indication of a user's restricted abilities.
contents.zh-CHS: - 与个人信息披露相关的隐私问题：如果使用功能匹配来选择适用于用户物理能力的内容，则此功能标签的异常值可能表示用户的受限能力。

contents.text: - Denial of service concerns related to consequences of specifying incorrect values: Failure to indicate a generic color space capability for a device may lead to failure to match color space for an application or document that does not require an exact color match.
contents.zh-CHS: - 与指定错误值的后果相关的拒绝服务问题：未能指示设备的通用颜色空间功能可能导致无法匹配不需要精确颜色匹配的应用程序或文档的颜色空间。

contents.text: - Related feature tags:
contents.zh-CHS: - 相关功能标签：

contents.text: color [3]
contents.zh-CHS: 颜色[3]

contents.text: - Related media types or data formats:
contents.zh-CHS: - 相关媒体类型或数据格式：

contents.text: TIFF-FX [7]
contents.zh-CHS: TIFF-FX[7]

contents.text: - Intended usage:
contents.zh-CHS: - 预期用途：

contents.text: Internet fax Color image scanning/rendering applications
contents.zh-CHS: Internet传真彩色图像扫描/渲染应用程序

contents.text: - Author/Change controller:
contents.zh-CHS: - 作者/变更控制员：

contents.text: IETF
contents.zh-CHS: IETF

contents.text: A.5 CIELAB color illuminant
contents.zh-CHS: A.5 CIELAB彩色光源

contents.text: - Media Feature tag name(s):
contents.zh-CHS: - 媒体功能标签名称：

contents.text: color-illuminant
contents.zh-CHS: 彩色光源

contents.text: - ASN.1 identifier associated with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 与此功能标签关联的ASN.1标识符：

contents.text: - Summary of the media features indicated:
contents.zh-CHS: - 显示的媒体功能摘要：

contents.text: This feature indicates a color illuminant. This has the effect of modifying the color space calibration to reflect the use of different sources of illumination.
contents.zh-CHS: 此功能指示彩色光源。这具有修改颜色空间校准以反映不同光源使用的效果。

contents.text: A color-illuminant value would normally be used only with a calibrated color space.
contents.zh-CHS: 颜色光源值通常仅用于校准的颜色空间。

contents.text: - Values appropriate for use with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 适用于此功能标记的值：

contents.text: Token
contents.zh-CHS: 代币

contents.text: CIELAB illuminant D50 values: D65 D75 SA SC F2 F7 F11
contents.zh-CHS: CIELAB光源D50值：D65 D75 SA SC F2 F7 F11

contents.text: Defined by color CTnnnn where 'nnnn' is a decimal temperature: representation of the illuminant color temperature in Kelvins.
contents.zh-CHS: 由color CTnnnn定义，其中“nnnn”是十进制温度：以开尔文表示光源色温。

contents.text: (may be extended by further registrations)
contents.zh-CHS: （可通过进一步注册延长）

contents.text: NOTE: The default color illuminant for Group 3 fax is D50.
contents.zh-CHS: 注：第3组传真的默认颜色光源为D50。

contents.text: - The feature tag is intended primarily for use in the following applications, protocols, services, or negotiation mechanisms:
contents.zh-CHS: - 功能标签主要用于以下应用程序、协议、服务或协商机制：

contents.text: Color image printing and display applications where the data resource used may depend upon detailed color handling capabilities of the recipient.
contents.zh-CHS: 彩色图像打印和显示应用程序，其中使用的数据资源可能取决于收件人的详细颜色处理能力。

contents.text: Scanning applications where the data transferred may depend upon the image generation capabilities of the originator.
contents.zh-CHS: 传输数据的扫描应用程序可能取决于发端人的图像生成能力。

contents.text: - Examples of typical use:
contents.zh-CHS: - 典型使用示例：

contents.text: To describe rendering or scanning capabilities, or to describe capabilities assumed by a document for which exact color handling capabilities are required:
contents.zh-CHS: 要描述渲染或扫描功能，或描述需要精确颜色处理功能的文档假定的功能：

contents.text: (& (color-space=CIELAB) (color-illuminant=D50) )
contents.zh-CHS: （&（颜色空间=CIELAB）（颜色光源=D50））

contents.text: - Related standards or documents:
contents.zh-CHS: - 相关标准或文件：

contents.text: CIELAB color illuminant representations are described in ITU T.4 [13], Annex E.6.7.
contents.zh-CHS: CIELAB颜色光源表示在ITU T.4[13]附录E.6.7中进行了描述。

contents.text: - Interoperability considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: - 互操作性注意事项：

contents.text: A color-handling receiver that supports a calibrated color space should indicate any constraint on the illuminants it can handle.
contents.zh-CHS: 支持校准颜色空间的颜色处理接收器应指示其可处理的光源上的任何约束。

contents.text: In the absence of a color-illuminant constraint, a receiver is presumed to accept and deal with any specified illuminant value.
contents.zh-CHS: 在没有颜色光源约束的情况下，假定接收器接受并处理任何指定的光源值。

contents.text: - Related feature tags:
contents.zh-CHS: - 相关功能标签：

contents.text: color [3] color-space [this document]
contents.zh-CHS: 颜色[3]颜色空间[本文档]

contents.text: - Related media types or data formats:
contents.zh-CHS: - 相关媒体类型或数据格式：

contents.text: TIFF-FX [7]
contents.zh-CHS: TIFF-FX[7]

contents.text: - Intended usage:
contents.zh-CHS: - 预期用途：

contents.text: Internet fax Color image scanning/rendering applications
contents.zh-CHS: Internet传真彩色图像扫描/渲染应用程序

contents.text: - Author/Change controller:
contents.zh-CHS: - 作者/变更控制员：

contents.text: IETF
contents.zh-CHS: IETF

contents.text: A.6 CIELAB color depth
contents.zh-CHS: A.6 CIELAB颜色深度

contents.text: - Media Feature tag name(s):
contents.zh-CHS: - 媒体功能标签名称：

contents.text: CIELAB-L-depth CIELAB-a-depth CIELAB-b-depth
contents.zh-CHS: CIELAB-L-深度CIELAB-a-深度CIELAB-b-深度

contents.text: - ASN.1 identifiers associated with these feature tags:
contents.zh-CHS: - ASN.1与这些特征标签相关的标识符：

contents.text: CIELAB-L-depth: 1.3.6.1.8.1.12 CIELAB-a-depth: 1.3.6.1.8.1.13 CIELAB-b-depth: 1.3.6.1.8.1.14
- Summary of the media features indicated:
contents.zh-CHS: - 显示的媒体功能摘要：

contents.text: These feature tags indicate a color depth capability; i.e. the level of detail to which an individual CIELAB color component can be specified. They define the number of distinct values possible for each of the color components L*, a* and b*.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些特征标签表示颜色深度能力；i、 e.可指定单个CIELAB颜色组件的详细程度。它们定义了每个颜色分量L*、a*和b*可能的不同值的数量。

contents.text: Typically, this feature would be used with 'color=mapped', and possibly 'color=grey' or 'color=full', to indicate the number of distinct colors that can be represented.
contents.zh-CHS: 通常，此功能将与“color=mapped”以及“color=grey”或“color=full”一起使用，以指示可以表示的不同颜色的数量。

contents.text: NOTE: this feature tag describes the number of values that can be represented for a color component, and does not necessarily indicate the number of distinct values that can be rendered or resolved by a system.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：此功能标签描述颜色组件可以表示的值的数量，不一定表示系统可以呈现或解析的不同值的数量。

contents.text: - Values appropriate for use with these feature tags:
contents.zh-CHS: - 适合与这些要素标记一起使用的值：

contents.text: Integer (>0)
- These feature tags are intended primarily for use in the following applications, protocols, services, or negotiation mechanisms:
contents.zh-CHS: - 这些功能标签主要用于以下应用程序、协议、服务或协商机制：

contents.text: Color image printing and display applications where the data resource used may depend upon color handling capabilities of the recipient.
contents.zh-CHS: 彩色图像打印和显示应用程序，其中使用的数据资源可能取决于收件人的颜色处理能力。

contents.text: Scanning applications where the data transferred may depend upon the image generation capabilities of the originator.
contents.zh-CHS: 传输数据的扫描应用程序可能取决于发端人的图像生成能力。

contents.text: - Examples of typical use:
contents.zh-CHS: - 典型使用示例：

contents.text: To describe rendering or scanning capabilities:
contents.zh-CHS: 要描述渲染或扫描功能，请执行以下操作：

contents.text:
(& (color=mapped) (color-levels<=240)
   (CIELAB-L-depth<=128)
   (CIELAB-a-depth<=128)
   (CIELAB-b-depth<=128) )
(& (color=full) (color-levels<=16777216)
   (CIELAB-L-depth<=256)
   (CIELAB-a-depth<=128)
   (CIELAB-b-depth<=128) )
To describe capabilities assumed by a document:
contents.zh-CHS: 要描述文档假定的功能，请执行以下操作：

contents.text:
(& (color=mapped) (color-levels=200)
   (CIELAB-L-depth=32)
   (CIELAB-a-depth=32)
   (CIELAB-b-depth=32) )
(& (color=full) (color-levels=32768)
   (CIELAB-L-depth=128)
   (CIELAB-a-depth=32)
   (CIELAB-b-depth=32) )
- Related standards or documents:
contents.zh-CHS: - 相关标准或文件：

contents.text: The memo "Media Features for Display, Print, and Fax" [3] defines a feature (color) for indicating basic color capabilities. CIELAB color space is defined in [19]
contents.zh-CHS: 备忘录“用于显示、打印和传真的媒体功能”[3]定义了用于指示基本颜色功能的功能（颜色）。CIELAB颜色空间在[19]中定义

contents.text: CIELAB use for fax is described in ITU T.42 [9]
contents.zh-CHS: ITU T.42[9]中描述了传真的CIELAB用途

contents.text: - Related feature tags:
contents.zh-CHS: - 相关功能标签：

contents.text:
color                 [3]
color-levels          [this document]
color-space           [this document]
- Intended usage:
contents.zh-CHS: - 预期用途：

contents.text: Internet fax Color image scanning/rendering applications
contents.zh-CHS: Internet传真彩色图像扫描/渲染应用程序

contents.text: - Author/Change controller:
contents.zh-CHS: - 作者/变更控制员：

contents.text: IETF
contents.zh-CHS: IETF

contents.text: A.7 CIELAB color gamut
contents.zh-CHS: A.7 CIELAB色域

contents.text: - Media Feature tag name(s):
contents.zh-CHS: - 媒体功能标签名称：

contents.text: CIELAB-L-min CIELAB-L-max CIELAB-a-min CIELAB-a-max CIELAB-b-min CIELAB-b-max
contents.zh-CHS: CIELAB-L-min CIELAB-L-max CIELAB-a-min CIELAB-a-max CIELAB-b-min CIELAB-b-max

contents.text: - ASN.1 identifiers associated with these feature tags:
contents.zh-CHS: - ASN.1与这些特征标签相关的标识符：

contents.text: - Summary of the media features indicated:
contents.zh-CHS: - 显示的媒体功能摘要：

contents.text: These feature indicate a supported range of color values, by indicating minimum and maximum values used for each color component in a CIELAB color space.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些功能通过指示CIELAB颜色空间中每个颜色组件使用的最小值和最大值来指示支持的颜色值范围。

contents.text: 'CIELAB-L-min' and 'CIELAB-L-max' are the minimum and maximum values of the L* component.
contents.zh-CHS: “CIELAB-L-min”和“CIELAB-L-max”是L*分量的最小值和最大值。

contents.text: 'CIELAB-a-min' and 'CIELAB-a-max' are the minimum and maximum values of the a* component.
contents.zh-CHS: “CIELAB-a-min”和“CIELAB-a-max”是a*组件的最小值和最大值。

contents.text: 'CIELAB-b-min' and 'CIELAB-b-max' are the minimum and maximum values of the b* component.
contents.zh-CHS: “CIELAB-b-min”和“CIELAB-b-max”是b*组件的最小值和最大值。

contents.text: NOTE: color component values are assumed to be rational numbers, so a limited gamut does not necessarily indicate limited color resolution.
contents.zh-CHS: 注：颜色分量值假定为有理数，因此有限的色域不一定表示有限的颜色分辨率。

contents.text: - Values appropriate for use with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 适用于此功能标记的值：

contents.text: Rational
contents.zh-CHS: 合理的

contents.text: - The feature tag is intended primarily for use in the following applications, protocols, services, or negotiation mechanisms:
contents.zh-CHS: - 功能标签主要用于以下应用程序、协议、服务或协商机制：

contents.text: Color image printing and display applications where the data resource used may depend upon detailed color handling capabilities of the recipient.
contents.zh-CHS: 彩色图像打印和显示应用程序，其中使用的数据资源可能取决于收件人的详细颜色处理能力。

contents.text: Scanning applications where the data transferred may depend upon the detailed color image generation capabilities of the originator.
contents.zh-CHS: 传输数据的扫描应用程序可能取决于发起者的详细彩色图像生成能力。

contents.text: - Examples of typical use:
contents.zh-CHS: - 典型使用示例：

contents.text: To describe rendering or scanning capabilities:
contents.zh-CHS: 要描述渲染或扫描功能，请执行以下操作：

contents.text:
(& (CIELAB-L-min>=0)
   (CIELAB-L-max<=100)
   (CIELAB-a-min>=-75)
   (CIELAB-a-max<=+75)
   (CIELAB-b-min>=-85)
   (CIELAB-b-max<=+85) )
To describe capabilities required by a document:
contents.zh-CHS: 要描述文档所需的功能，请执行以下操作：

contents.text:
(& (CIELAB-L-min=20)
   (CIELAB-L-max=80)
   (CIELAB-a-min=-35)
   (CIELAB-a-max=+55)
   (CIELAB-b-min=-45)
   (CIELAB-b-max=+65) )
- Related standards or documents:
contents.zh-CHS: - 相关标准或文件：

contents.text: CIELAB color space is defined in [19]
contents.zh-CHS: CIELAB颜色空间在[19]中定义

contents.text: CIELAB use for fax is described in ITU T.42 [9]
contents.zh-CHS: ITU T.42[9]中描述了传真的CIELAB用途

contents.text: - Interoperability considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: - 互操作性注意事项：

contents.text: When describing a recipient's capabilities, the minimum and maximum color component values that can be rendered should be indicated by inequalities as shown in the examples above.
contents.zh-CHS: 当描述接收者的能力时，可以呈现的最小和最大颜色分量值应该用不等式表示，如上述示例所示。

contents.text: When describing a document, the actual minimum and maximum color component values used should be indicated, as shown above.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述文档时，应指出实际使用的最小和最大颜色分量值，如上所示。

contents.text: - Security considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: - 安全考虑：

contents.text: - Privacy concerns, related to exposure of personal information: Where feature matching is used to select content applicable to the physical abilities of a user, unusual values for this feature tag might give an indication of a user's restricted abilities.
contents.zh-CHS: - 与个人信息披露相关的隐私问题：如果使用功能匹配来选择适用于用户物理能力的内容，则此功能标签的异常值可能表示用户的受限能力。

contents.text: - Related feature tags:
contents.zh-CHS: - 相关功能标签：

contents.text: color [3] color-space [this document]
contents.zh-CHS: 颜色[3]颜色空间[本文档]

contents.text: - Related media types or data formats:
contents.zh-CHS: - 相关媒体类型或数据格式：

contents.text: TIFF-FX [7]
contents.zh-CHS: TIFF-FX[7]

contents.text: - Intended usage:
contents.zh-CHS: - 预期用途：

contents.text: Internet fax Color image scanning/rendering applications
contents.zh-CHS: Internet传真彩色图像扫描/渲染应用程序

contents.text: - Author/Change controller:
contents.zh-CHS: - 作者/变更控制员：

contents.text: IETF
contents.zh-CHS: IETF

contents.text: A.8 Image file structure
contents.zh-CHS: A.8图像文件结构

contents.text: - Media Feature tag name(s):
contents.zh-CHS: - 媒体功能标签名称：

contents.text: image-file-structure
contents.zh-CHS: 图像文件结构

contents.text: - ASN.1 identifier associated with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 与此功能标签关联的ASN.1标识符：

contents.text: - Summary of the media features indicated:
contents.zh-CHS: - 显示的媒体功能摘要：

contents.text: This feature indicates a file structure used for transfer and presentation of image data.
contents.zh-CHS: 此功能表示用于传输和显示图像数据的文件结构。

contents.text: It does not indicate image data coding: that is described by separate feature tags (image-coding, etc.).
contents.zh-CHS: 它不表示图像数据编码：由单独的特征标签（图像编码等）描述。

contents.text: - Values appropriate for use with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 适用于此功能标记的值：

contents.text: Token
contents.zh-CHS: 代币

contents.text: Image file TIFF structure TIFF-limited options: TIFF-minimal TIFF-MRC TIFF-MRC-limited
contents.zh-CHS: 图像文件TIFF结构TIFF limited选项：TIFF最小TIFF-MRC TIFF MRC limited

contents.text: (may be extended by further registrations, to cover non-TIFF image file structures)
contents.zh-CHS: （可通过进一步注册扩展，以涵盖非TIFF图像文件结构）

contents.text: - The feature tag is intended primarily for use in the following applications, protocols, services, or negotiation mechanisms:
contents.zh-CHS: - 功能标签主要用于以下应用程序、协议、服务或协商机制：

contents.text: Internet fax, and other print or display applications that transfer image data.
contents.zh-CHS: Internet传真和其他传输图像数据的打印或显示应用程序。

contents.text: - Examples of typical use:
contents.zh-CHS: - 典型使用示例：

contents.text: See Appendix B of this memo.
contents.zh-CHS: 见本备忘录附录B。

contents.text: - Considerations particular to use in individual applications, protocols, services, or negotiation mechanisms:
contents.zh-CHS: - 在单个应用程序、协议、服务或协商机制中使用的特殊注意事项：

contents.text: This tag is intended to provide information about an image file structure. Information about image data coding is provided by other tags.
contents.zh-CHS: 此标记旨在提供有关图像文件结构的信息。有关图像数据编码的信息由其他标签提供。

contents.text: The following tag values are defined here:
contents.zh-CHS: 此处定义了以下标记值：

contents.text: o 'TIFF' indicates image data enclosed and tagged using TIFF structures described in Adobe's definition of TIFF [20].
contents.zh-CHS: o “TIFF”表示使用Adobe的TIFF定义中描述的TIFF结构封装和标记的图像数据[20]。

contents.text: o 'TIFF-limited' indicates image data structured using TIFF, but with limitations on the placement of Image File Descriptors (IFDs) within the file, which are indicated in section 4.4.6 of RFC 2301 [7].
contents.zh-CHS: o “TIFF limited”表示使用TIFF结构化的图像数据，但对文件中图像文件描述符（IFD）的放置有限制，如RFC 2301[7]第4.4.6节所示。

contents.text: o 'TIFF-minimal' indicates a TIFF image format that meets the IFD placement, byte ordering and bit ordering requirements of the "minimal black and white mode" described in section 3.5 of RFC 2301 [7], also known as TIFF-S.
contents.zh-CHS: o “TIFF最小”表示满足RFC 2301[7]第3.5节所述“最小黑白模式”（也称为TIFF-S）的IFD放置、字节排序和位排序要求的TIFF图像格式。

contents.text: o 'TIFF-MRC' uses a TIFF image structure [20] augmented with a sub-IFD structure, described for the "Mixed Raster Content mode" in section 8.1.2 of RFC 2301 [7], also known as TIFF-M (see also tag 'MRC-mode').
contents.zh-CHS: o “TIFF-MRC”使用一个TIFF图像结构[20]，并增加了一个子IFD结构，如RFC 2301[7]第8.1.2节中“混合光栅内容模式”所述，也称为TIFF-M（另见标签“MRC模式”）。

contents.text: o 'TIFF-MRC-limited' is the same as 'TIFF-MRC', except that the IFD placement is constrained as for 'TIFF-limited'.
contents.zh-CHS: o “TIFF MRC limited”与“TIFF-MRC”相同，只是IFD的放置受到“TIFF limited”的限制。

contents.text: Registration of additional image file structure tags should focus similarly on image file structure issues, not raw image data compression and coding. As a guide, an image file structure may contain image data coded in a variety of ways, and carries information to describe that coding separately from MIME content-type labelling, etc.
contents.zh-CHS: 其他图像文件结构标记的注册应同样关注图像文件结构问题，而不是原始图像数据压缩和编码。作为指南，图像文件结构可以包含以各种方式编码的图像数据，并且携带与MIME内容类型标签等分开描述该编码的信息。

contents.text: - Related feature tags:
contents.zh-CHS: - 相关功能标签：

contents.text: image-coding [this document] MRC-mode [this document]
contents.zh-CHS: 图像编码[本文件]MRC模式[本文件]

contents.text: - Related media types or data formats:
contents.zh-CHS: - 相关媒体类型或数据格式：

contents.text: TIFF-FX [7] TIFF V6.0 (Adobe) [20]
contents.zh-CHS: TIFF-FX[7]TIFF V6.0（Adobe）[20]

contents.text: - Intended usage:
contents.zh-CHS: - 预期用途：

contents.text: Internet fax Image scanning/rendering applications
contents.zh-CHS: Internet传真图像扫描/渲染应用程序
