contents.zh-CHS: - 作者/变更控制员：

contents.text: IETF
contents.zh-CHS: IETF

contents.text: A.9 Image data coding
contents.zh-CHS: A.9图像数据编码

contents.text: - Media Feature tag name(s):
contents.zh-CHS: - 媒体功能标签名称：

contents.text: image-coding
contents.zh-CHS: 图像编码

contents.text: - ASN.1 identifier associated with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 与此功能标签关联的ASN.1标识符：

contents.text: - Summary of the media features indicated:
contents.zh-CHS: - 显示的媒体功能摘要：

contents.text: This feature tag indicates a form of image data compression and coding used.
contents.zh-CHS: 此功能标签表示使用的图像数据压缩和编码形式。

contents.text: It identifies a generic image coding technique used, without regard to any specific profiling of that technique that may be applied. Values for this feature are generally applicable across a wide range of image transfer applications.
contents.zh-CHS: 它确定了所使用的通用图像编码技术，而不考虑可能应用的该技术的任何特定概要。此功能的值通常适用于各种图像传输应用。

contents.text: This information is distinct from the image file structure and MRC information conveyed by the 'image-file-structure' tags.
contents.zh-CHS: 此信息不同于“图像文件结构”标记传递的图像文件结构和MRC信息。

contents.text: - Values appropriate for use with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 适用于此功能标记的值：

contents.text: Token MH MR MMR JBIG JPEG
contents.zh-CHS: 令牌MH MR MMR JBIG JPEG

contents.text: (may be extended by further registrations)
contents.zh-CHS: （可通过进一步注册延长）

contents.text: - The feature tag is intended primarily for use in the following applications, protocols, services, or negotiation mechanisms:
contents.zh-CHS: - 功能标签主要用于以下应用程序、协议、服务或协商机制：

contents.text: Internet fax, and other applications that transfer image data.
contents.zh-CHS: Internet传真和其他传输图像数据的应用程序。

contents.text: - Examples of typical use:
contents.zh-CHS: - 典型使用示例：

contents.text: See Appendix B of this memo.
contents.zh-CHS: 见本备忘录附录B。

contents.text: - Related standards or documents:
contents.zh-CHS: - 相关标准或文件：

contents.text:
MH, MR:     ITU T.4 [13]
MMR:        ITU T.6 [14]
JPEG:       ITU T.81 [16]
JBIG:       ITU T.82 [17]
- Interoperability considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: - 互操作性注意事项：

contents.text: To establish the correct conditions for interoperability between systems, capabilities to handle the generic image coding technique and the specific image coding constraints must be established.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了建立系统间互操作性的正确条件，必须建立处理通用图像编码技术和特定图像编码约束的能力。

contents.zh-CHS: A.10图像编码约束

contents.text: - Media Feature tag name(s):
contents.zh-CHS: - 媒体功能标签名称：

contents.zh-CHS: 图像编码约束

contents.text: - ASN.1 identifier associated with these feature tags:
contents.zh-CHS: - ASN.1与这些功能标签关联的标识符：

contents.text: - Summary of the media features indicated:
contents.zh-CHS: - 显示的媒体功能摘要：

contents.zh-CHS: 此功能标签使用特定的配置文件或使用限制来限定“图像编码”功能。

contents.text: Values for this feature are generally specific to some given value of 'image-coding' and also to some restricted application or class of applications.
contents.zh-CHS: 此功能的值通常特定于“图像编码”的某些给定值以及某些受限应用或应用类别。

contents.text: A.11 JBIG stripe size
contents.zh-CHS: A.11 JBIG条纹尺寸

contents.text: - Media Feature tag name(s):
contents.zh-CHS: - 媒体功能标签名称：

contents.text: JBIG-stripe-size
contents.zh-CHS: JBIG条纹尺寸

contents.text: - ASN.1 identifier associated with these feature tags:
contents.zh-CHS: - ASN.1与这些功能标签关联的标识符：

contents.text: - Summary of the media features indicated:
contents.zh-CHS: - 显示的媒体功能摘要：

contents.text: This feature is a specific usage constraint that is applied to JBIG image coding (image-coding=JBIG), and indicates the allowable size for each stripe of an image, except the last.
contents.zh-CHS: 此功能是应用于JBIG图像编码（image coding=JBIG）的特定用法约束，并指示图像每个条带（最后一条除外）的允许大小。

contents.text: A stripe of a JBIG image is a delimited horizontal band of compressed image data that can be decompressed separately from the surrounding data.
contents.zh-CHS: JBIG图像的条带是压缩图像数据的分隔水平带，可以与周围的数据分开解压缩。

contents.text: - Values appropriate for use with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 适用于此功能标记的值：

contents.text: Integer (>0)
- The feature tag is intended primarily for use in the following applications, protocols, services, or negotiation mechanisms:
contents.zh-CHS: - 功能标签主要用于以下应用程序、协议、服务或协商机制：

contents.text: Internet fax, and other applications that transfer image data.
contents.zh-CHS: Internet传真和其他传输图像数据的应用程序。

contents.text: - Examples of typical use:
contents.zh-CHS: - 典型使用示例：

contents.text: (JBIG-stripe-size=128) (JBIG-stripe-size>0)
contents.zh-CHS: （JBIG条带大小=128）（JBIG条带大小>0）

contents.zh-CHS: - 相关标准或文件：

JBIG-T43:   ITU T.43 [10]
- Considerations particular to use in individual applications, protocols, services, or negotiation mechanisms:
contents.zh-CHS: - 在单个应用程序、协议、服务或协商机制中使用的特殊注意事项：

contents.text: In the case of Internet fax, the specific constraints allowed for a receiver are those given as examples above.
contents.zh-CHS: 在因特网传真的情况下，接收机所允许的特定约束如上面的示例所示。

contents.text: Specifying a stripe size that is not limited (JBIG-stripe-size>0) means that an entire page of image data is encoded as a single unit. This may place considerable demands on the memory of a receiving system, as the entire stripe needs to be buffered in memory.
contents.zh-CHS: 指定不受限制的条带大小（JBIG stripe size>0）意味着将整个图像数据页编码为单个单元。这可能会对接收系统的内存造成相当大的需求，因为整个条带需要在内存中进行缓冲。

contents.text: - Interoperability considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: - 互操作性注意事项：

contents.text: To establish the correct conditions for interoperability between systems, capabilities to handle the generic image coding technique and the specific image coding constraints must be established.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了建立系统间互操作性的正确条件，必须建立处理通用图像编码技术和特定图像编码约束的能力。

contents.text: A.12 Image interleave
contents.zh-CHS: A.12图像交织

contents.text: - Media Feature tag name(s):
contents.zh-CHS: - 媒体功能标签名称：

contents.text: image-interleave
contents.zh-CHS: 图像交织

contents.text: - ASN.1 identifier associated with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 与此功能标签关联的ASN.1标识符：

contents.text: - Summary of the media features indicated:
contents.zh-CHS: - 显示的媒体功能摘要：

contents.text: This feature indicates an image interleave capability.
contents.zh-CHS: 此功能表示图像交错功能。

contents.text: It may be used with JBIG images (image-coding=JBIG) to indicate color plane interleaving of either stripes or entire image planes.
contents.zh-CHS: 它可与JBIG图像（图像编码=JBIG）一起使用，以指示条纹或整个图像平面的色平面交错。

contents.text: - Values appropriate for use with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 适用于此功能标记的值：

contents.text: Token Stripe Plane
contents.zh-CHS: 令牌条带平面

contents.text: - The feature tag is intended primarily for use in the following applications, protocols, services, or negotiation mechanisms:
contents.zh-CHS: - 功能标签主要用于以下应用程序、协议、服务或协商机制：

contents.text: Internet fax, and other applications that transfer image data.
contents.zh-CHS: Internet传真和其他传输图像数据的应用程序。

contents.text: - Examples of typical use:
contents.zh-CHS: - 典型使用示例：

contents.text: (image-interleave=stripe) (image-interleave=[stripe,plane])
contents.zh-CHS: （图像交错=条纹）（图像交错=[条纹，平面]）

contents.text: - Considerations particular to use in individual applications, protocols, services, or negotiation mechanisms:
contents.zh-CHS: - 在单个应用程序、协议、服务或协商机制中使用的特殊注意事项：

contents.text: Specifying a plane interleave means that an entire page of image data must be buffered in order to generate or render the image. This may place considerable demands on the memory of a sending or receiving system.
contents.zh-CHS: 指定平面交错意味着为了生成或渲染图像，必须缓冲整个图像数据页。这可能会对发送或接收系统的内存提出相当大的要求。

contents.zh-CHS: - 相关功能标签：

contents.zh-CHS: 图像编码[本文件]JBIG条纹尺寸[本文件]

contents.zh-CHS: - 相关媒体类型或数据格式：

contents.zh-CHS: - 预期用途：

contents.zh-CHS: Internet传真彩色图像扫描/渲染应用程序

contents.text: IETF

contents.text: A.13 Color subsampling
contents.zh-CHS: A.13颜色二次抽样

contents.text: - Media Feature tag name(s):
contents.zh-CHS: - 媒体功能标签名称：

contents.text: color-subsampling
contents.zh-CHS: 彩色二次采样

contents.text: - ASN.1 identifier associated with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 与此功能标签关联的ASN.1标识符：

contents.text: - Summary of the media features indicated:
contents.zh-CHS: - 显示的媒体功能摘要：

contents.text: This feature tag indicates whether color information may be subsampled with respect to luminance data.
contents.zh-CHS: 此功能标签指示颜色信息是否可以相对于亮度数据进行二次采样。

contents.text: It is used with continuous color images (color=full), color spaces that use separate luminance and color components (e.g. color-space=LAB), and image file structures that support color subsampling.
contents.zh-CHS: 它用于连续彩色图像（color=full）、使用单独亮度和颜色组件的颜色空间（例如color space=LAB）以及支持颜色子采样的图像文件结构。

contents.text: - Values appropriate for use with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 适用于此功能标记的值：

contents.text: String "1:1:1" This value indicates a full set of color component samples for each luminance component sample.
contents.zh-CHS: 字符串“1:1:1”此值表示每个亮度分量样本的一整套颜色分量样本。

contents.text: "4:1:1" This value indicates one set of color component samples for each 4 luminance samples.
contents.zh-CHS: “4:1:1”该值表示每4个亮度样本有一组颜色分量样本。

contents.text: (may be extended by further registrations)
contents.zh-CHS: （可通过进一步注册延长）

contents.text: - The feature tag is intended primarily for use in the following applications, protocols, services, or negotiation mechanisms:
contents.zh-CHS: - 功能标签主要用于以下应用程序、协议、服务或协商机制：

contents.text: Color image printing and display applications where the data resource used may depend upon color handling capabilities of the recipient.
contents.zh-CHS: 彩色图像打印和显示应用程序，其中使用的数据资源可能取决于收件人的颜色处理能力。

contents.text: Scanning applications where the data transferred may depend upon the image generation capabilities of the originator.
contents.zh-CHS: 传输数据的扫描应用程序可能取决于发端人的图像生成能力。

contents.text: - Examples of typical use:
contents.zh-CHS: - 典型使用示例：

contents.text:
(& (color=full) (color-space=[LAB,CIELAB])
   (color-subsampling=["1:1:1","4:1:1"]) )

contents.text: A.14 MRC availability and mode
contents.zh-CHS: A.14 MRC可用性和模式

contents.text: - Media Feature tag name(s):
contents.zh-CHS: - 媒体功能标签名称：

contents.text: MRC-mode
contents.zh-CHS: MRC模式

contents.text: - ASN.1 identifier associated with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 与此功能标签关联的ASN.1标识符：

contents.text: - Summary of the media features indicated:
contents.zh-CHS: - 显示的媒体功能摘要：

contents.text: This feature is used to indicate the availability of MRC (mixed raster content) image format capability, and also the MRC mode available. A zero value indicates MRC is not available, a non-zero value (in the range 1..7) indicates the available MRC mode number.
contents.zh-CHS: 此功能用于指示MRC（混合光栅内容）图像格式功能的可用性，以及可用的MRC模式。零值表示MRC不可用，非零值（范围1..7）表示可用的MRC模式编号。

contents.text: An MRC formatted document is actually a collection of several images, each of which is described by a separate feature collection. An MRC-capable receiver is presumed to be capable of accepting any combination of contained images that conform to the MRC construction rules, where each such image matches the separately declared resolution, color capability, color model, image coding, and any other capabilities.
contents.zh-CHS: MRC格式的文档实际上是几个图像的集合，每个图像由单独的特征集合描述。假设具有MRC能力的接收器能够接受符合MRC构造规则的包含图像的任何组合，其中每个这样的图像匹配单独声明的分辨率、颜色能力、颜色模型、图像编码和任何其他能力。

contents.text: NOTE: an MRC formatted document may appear within a TIFF image file structure.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：MRC格式的文档可能出现在TIFF图像文件结构中。

contents.text: Within an MRC-formatted document, multi-level coders are used for foreground and background images (i.e. odd-numbered layers: 1, 3, 5, etc.) and bi-level coders are used for mask layers (i.e. even numbered layers 2, 4, 6, etc.).
contents.zh-CHS: 在MRC格式的文档中，多级编码器用于前景和背景图像（即奇数层：1、3、5等），双层编码器用于遮罩层（即偶数层2、4、6等）。

contents.text: - Values appropriate for use with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 适用于此功能标记的值：

contents.text: Integer (0..7)
- The feature tag is intended primarily for use in the following applications, protocols, services, or negotiation mechanisms:
contents.zh-CHS: - 功能标签主要用于以下应用程序、协议、服务或协商机制：

contents.text: Internet fax, and other applications that transfer image data.
contents.zh-CHS: Internet传真和其他传输图像数据的应用程序。

contents.text: - Examples of typical use:
contents.zh-CHS: - 典型使用示例：

contents.text: See Appendix B of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 见本文件附录B。

contents.text: - Related standards or documents:
contents.zh-CHS: - 相关标准或文件：

contents.text: - Interoperability considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: - 互操作性注意事项：

contents.text: To establish the correct conditions for interoperability between systems, capabilities to handle the MRC mode and any contained image coding techniques must be established.
contents.zh-CHS: 为建立系统间互操作性的正确条件，必须建立处理MRC模式和任何包含的图像编码技术的能力。

contents.text: - Related feature tags:

contents.zh-CHS: 图像编码[本文件]MRC最大条纹尺寸[本文件]

contents.text: A.15 MRC maximum stripe size
contents.zh-CHS: A.15 MRC最大条纹尺寸

contents.text: - Media Feature tag name(s):
contents.zh-CHS: - 媒体功能标签名称：

contents.text: MRC-max-stripe-size
contents.zh-CHS: 最大条纹尺寸

contents.text: - ASN.1 identifier associated with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 与此功能标签关联的ASN.1标识符：

contents.text: - Summary of the media features indicated:
contents.zh-CHS: - 显示的媒体功能摘要：

contents.text: This feature may be used with MRC coding (MRC-mode>=1), and indicates the maximum number of scan lines in each MRC stripe.
contents.zh-CHS: 此功能可用于MRC编码（MRC模式>=1），并指示每个MRC条带中的最大扫描线数。

contents.text: The value given indicates an upper bound on the stripe size. The actual value may vary between stripes, and the actual size for each stripe is indicated in the image data.
contents.zh-CHS: 给定的值表示条带大小的上限。条纹之间的实际值可能不同，并且每个条纹的实际大小在图像数据中指示。

contents.text: - Values appropriate for use with this feature tag:
contents.zh-CHS: - 适用于此功能标记的值：

contents.text: Integer (>0)
- The feature tag is intended primarily for use in the following applications, protocols, services, or negotiation mechanisms:
contents.zh-CHS: - 功能标签主要用于以下应用程序、协议、服务或协商机制：

contents.text: Internet fax, and other applications that transfer image data.
contents.zh-CHS: Internet传真和其他传输图像数据的应用程序。

contents.text: - Examples of typical use:
contents.zh-CHS: - 典型使用示例：

contents.text:
(MRC-max-stripe-size<=256)
(MRC-max-stripe-size>=0)
- Considerations particular to use in individual applications, protocols, services, or negotiation mechanisms:
contents.zh-CHS: - 在单个应用程序、协议、服务或协商机制中使用的特殊注意事项：

contents.text: For Internet fax, the legal constraints for an image receiver are those given as examples above.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于Internet传真，图像接收器的法律约束如上所示。

contents.text: Appendix B: TIFF mode descriptions
contents.zh-CHS: 附录B：TIFF模式说明

contents.text: This appendix contains descriptions of the TIFF modes defined by RFC 2301 [7], presented as feature set expressions in the form defined by "A syntax for describing media feature sets" [2] and using the feature schema introduced by this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 本附录包含RFC 2301[7]定义的TIFF模式的说明，以“描述媒体功能集的语法”[2]定义的形式，并使用本文档介绍的功能模式，以功能集表达式的形式呈现。

contents.text: These may be taken as illustrations of the feature set combinations that are required for the corresponding TIFF profiles described by RFC 2301.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些可作为RFC 2301描述的相应TIFF配置文件所需的特征集组合的图示。

contents.text: TIFF-S has no optional elements, so is presented as a single feature set. Other profiles are presented as (TIFF-x-base) and (TIFF-x-full) indicating the minimum and full feature sets associated with each profile.
contents.zh-CHS: TIFF-S没有可选元素，因此作为单个功能集提供。其他配置文件显示为（TIFF-x-base）和（TIFF-x-full），表示与每个配置文件关联的最小和完整功能集。

contents.text:
(TIFF-S) :-
     (& (image-file-structure=TIFF-S)
        (color=Binary)
        (image-coding=MH) (MRC-mode=0)
        (| (& (dpi=200)
              (dpi-xyratio=[200/100,200/200])
              (size-x=1728/200) )
           (& (dpi=204)
              (dpi-xyratio=[204/98,204/196]
              (size-x=1728/204) ) )
        (paper-size=A4) )

(TIFF-F-base) :-
   (& (image-file-structure=TIFF-F)
      (color=Binary)
      (image-coding=MH) (MRC-mode=0)
      (dpi=204)
      (dpi-xyratio=[204/98,204/196])
      (size-x=1728/204)
      (paper-size=A4) )

(TIFF-J-base) :-
   (& (image-file-structure=TIFF-J)
      (color=Binary)
      (MRC-mode=0)
      (image-coding=JBIG)
      (image-coding-constraint=JBIG-T85)
      (JBIG-stripe-size=128)
      (dpi=204)
      (dpi-xyratio=[204/98,204/196])
      (size-x=1728/204)
      (paper-size=A4) )
(TIFF-C-base) :- (& (image-file-structure=TIFF-C)
contents.zh-CHS: （TIFF-C-base）：-（&（图像文件结构=TIFF-C）

contents.text:
(color=grey)
(color-levels<=256)
(MRC-mode=0)
(image-coding=JPEG) (image-coding-constraint=JPEG-T4E)
(color-space=CIELAB)
(CIELAB-L-depth<=101)
(CIELAB-L-min>=0)
(CIELAB-L-max<=100)
(color-illuminant=D50)
(dpi=200) (dpi-xyratio=1)
(size-x=864/100)
(paper-size=A4) )

(TIFF-C-full) :-
   (& (image-file-structure=TIFF-C)
      (image-coding=JPEG) (image-coding-constraint=JPEG-T4E)
      (color-space=CIELAB)
      (| (& (color=grey)
            (color-levels<=4096)
            (CIELAB-L-depth<=4096) )
         (& (color=full)
            (color-levels<=68719476736)
            (color-subsampling=["4:1:1","1:1:1"])
            (CIELAB-L-depth<=4096)
            (CIELAB-a-depth<=4096)
            (CIELAB-b-depth<=4096) ) )
      (MRC-mode=0)
      (dpi=[100,200,300,400]) (dpi-xyratio=1)
      (size-x=[864/100,1024/100,1216/100])
      (paper-size=[A4, B4, A3, letter, legal]) )

(TIFF-L-base) :-
   (& (image-file-structure=TIFF-L)
      (MRC-mode=0)
      (image-coding=JBIG)
      (image-coding-constraint=JBIG-T43)
      (JBIG-stripe-size=128)
      (image-interleave=stripe)
      (color=grey)
      (color-levels<=256)
      (color-space=CIELAB)
      (CIELAB-L-depth=101)
      (CIELAB-L-min>=0)
      (CIELAB-L-max<=100)
      (color-illuminant=D50)
      (dpi=200) (dpi-xyratio=1)
      (size-x=864/100)
      (paper-size=A4) )

(TIFF-L-full) :-
   (& (image-file-structure=TIFF-L)
      (MRC-mode=0)
      (image-coding=JBIG)
      (image-coding-constraint=JBIG-T43)
      (JBIG-stripe-size>0)
      (image-interleave=[stripe, plane])
      (| (& (color=limited)
            (color-levels<=8)
            (color-space=[Device-RGB, Device-CMY] ) )
         (& (color=limited)
            (color-levels<=16)
            (color-space=Device-CMYK) )
         (& (color=mapped)
            (color-levels<=65536)
            (color-space=CIELAB)
            (CIELAB-L-depth<=4096)
            (CIELAB-a-depth<=4096)
            (CIELAB-b-depth<=4096) )
         (& (color=grey)
            (color-levels<=4096)
            (color-space=CIELAB)
            (CIELAB-L-depth<=4096) )
         (& (color=full)
            (color-space=CIELAB)
            (color-levels<=68719476736)
            (CIELAB-L-depth<=4096)
            (CIELAB-a-depth<=4096)
            (CIELAB-b-depth<=4096)
            (CIELAB-L-min>=0) ) )
      (dpi=[100,200,300,400]) (dpi-xyratio=1)
      (size-x=[864/100,1024/100,1216/100])
      (paper-size=[A4, B4, A3, letter, legal]) )

(TIFF-M-base) :-
   (& (image-file-structure=TIFF-M)
      (MRC-mode>=1)
      (MRC-max-stripe-size<=256) )
(TIFF-M-full) :- (& (image-file-structure=TIFF-M) (MRC-mode>=1) )
contents.zh-CHS: （TIFF-M-full）：-（&（图像文件结构=TIFF-M）（MRC模式>=1））

contents.text: Support for multiple TIFF profiles may be indicated by combining their expressions with the OR operator; e.g.
contents.zh-CHS: 支持多个TIFF配置文件可通过将其表达式与OR运算符组合来表示；例如

contents.text: (| (TIFF-F) (TIFF-S) (TIFF-J) )
contents.zh-CHS: （|（TIFF-F）（TIFF-S）（TIFF-J））

contents.text: indicates support for all black-and-white modes.
contents.zh-CHS: 表示支持所有黑白模式。

contents.text: TIFF-M is a composite mode and must be used in conjunction with some other mode to define the particular capabilities of a receiver; e.g.
contents.zh-CHS: TIFF-M是一种复合模式，必须与其他模式结合使用，以定义接收器的特定功能；例如

contents.text: (| (TIFF-M-base) (TIFF-S) (TIFF-J-full) (TIFF-C-base) (TIFF-L-full) )
contents.zh-CHS: （|（TIFF-M-base）（TIFF-S）（TIFF-J-full）（TIFF-C-base）（TIFF-L-full））

contents.text: Each sub-image in an MRC image must conform to the capabilities indicated AND also to any additional constraints imposed by the MRC structure, such as bi-level mask layer, etc. See sections A.13 and section 3.7.
contents.zh-CHS: MRC图像中的每个子图像必须符合所示的功能以及MRC结构施加的任何附加约束，如双层掩模层等。参见第A.13节和第3.7节。

contents.text: Appendix C: Changes from RFC 2531
contents.zh-CHS: 附录C：RFC 2531的变更

contents.text: 00a 23-Jun-1999 Updated Appendix B with more complete TIFF-FX profile descriptions. Added note to section 3.5 clarifying the meaning of (color=limited) in the context of Internet fax. Added note to section 3.6 and A.6 to clarify interpretation of color depth. In A.6, noted that color gamut is not the same as color resolution; fixed example. Split section 3.7 into two sections, dealing with simple image coding options and MRC composite image options. Added new feature tag 'color-illuminant' (sections 3.6, A.5). Added cross-references from TIFF-M image file structure to MRC-mode tag. Updated introduction and references.
contents.zh-CHS: 00a 1999年6月23日更新了附录B，提供了更完整的TIFF-FX配置文件说明。在第3.5节中添加注释，以澄清互联网传真中（颜色=有限）的含义。在第3.6节和A.6节中添加注释，以澄清颜色深度的解释。在A.6中，注意到色域与颜色分辨率不同；固定的例子。将第3.7节分为两节，处理简单图像编码选项和MRC合成图像选项。添加了新的功能标签“彩色光源”（第3.6节，A.5节）。添加了从TIFF-M图像文件结构到MRC模式标记的交叉引用。更新介绍和参考资料。

contents.text: 00b 10-Aug-1999 Bring examples into line with T.30 mapping document [4], and reorganize to make the expression structure less complex. Add details of mailing list for discussion. Added JPEG-only colour example. Change definition of image-file-structure tag to indicate more precisely what is being defined, and to draw out the distinction between a file structure to contain MRC images (image-file-structure), and the MRC image model (MRC-mode).
contents.zh-CHS: 00b 1999年8月10日将示例与T.30映射文档[4]保持一致，并重新组织以降低表达式结构的复杂性。添加邮件列表的详细信息以供讨论。添加了仅JPEG颜色示例。更改图像文件结构标记的定义，以更精确地指示所定义的内容，并指出包含MRC图像的文件结构（图像文件结构）和MRC图像模型（MRC模式）之间的区别。

contents.text: 01a 01-Oct-1999 Update author's address and some references.
contents.zh-CHS: 01a 01-10-1999更新作者地址和一些参考资料。

contents.text: 01b 05-Jan-2000 Incorporate last-call review comments (all editorial).
contents.zh-CHS: 01b 2000年1月5日纳入最后一次电话审查意见（所有编辑意见）。
